Front Line Weekly 9

<Previous | Next > Page

 

Interesting infomation from the New Oxford Review

http://www.newoxfordreview.org/article.jsp?did=0206-galloy

 

Thursday, August 12, 2010 in front of the Death Mill, Planned Parenthood

Talk about being traumatized that's what we experienced today.The shedding of innocent blood just kept on going.  It was a nightmare.  Martha, John & I
got to the front lines & then Carole joined us about 15 minutes later.  John
brought a white statue of the Blessed Mother & he brought it out to the front lines.  We always have the image of Our Lady of Guadeloupe, on a poster, out on the front lines.   I do try to be a Christian out on the front lines.  The emotional toil it takes to be in a place, three times a week every week, where they are slaughtering people & you can't do a darn thing about it.  We do pray & lives have been saved & we are grateful for that that's for sure but so many mothers are going into Planned Parenthood & letting the abortionist Rachael Phelps kill their precious babies.  You can't put the baby back together, once you realized what you did.  The hearts are very hard out there & it's  EVIL, to say the least.  It is the war zone & it stinks.

The first horror was when I was out there on the sidewalk I decided to go
over to the brick side of Planned Parenthood that we would have all three
sides covered.  Bill, our war veteran was across the street & Martha, Carole
& John were by the bush side so I decided to move to the other side.  I
thought that I would have a good view but I was wrong.  The bushes that Ted Hosner planted does block most of the parking lot.  I really couldn't see the girls until they were in the foyer of Planned Parenthood.  I had the mega phone & was using it then I heard Martha calling out to the girls in her own voice.  I stopped using the mega phone & let her speak.  All of a sudden I heard a voice near me saying "shut the .... up".  I then used the mega phone & laid into her.  I said "watch your mouth, how dare you talk to this remarkable woman like that, you have no respect.  Would you talk to your own mother that way"?  "This is a killing mill where babies are being killed as we speak".   A few minutes later a young girl walked over to the three who were over on the bush side.  I then decided to go back over to where the rest of the team were.  I heard, the girl say something about "I'm here to say that I'm sorry for what I said".  I thought, that was good. Then I heard her say "my girlfriend is in there for an abortion".  What!!  I butted in & said "why aren't you in there trying to save this little baby & you will regret for ever driving & supporting your friend today in having an abortion".  "That's what you think", she said.  "No, that's the hard truth, I'm not sugar coating this, you are involved in a murder & it will effect you, for the rest of your life & your relationship with your friend."  As she was about to leave the sidewalk John had said something else to her & she turned around to give him the 'bird'.  I said to her "you just said that you wanted to rape him".  She looked perplexed.  I said "that's what the 'finger' jester really means".  She walked back into Planned Parenthood.  I was so angry that we couldn't get through to her. In the meantime a girl walked by Martha & she asked her if she wanted some children's clothes that were 'free' & she said that she did.  So off they go to the Focus Center to the Material Aid Room were Rose & Suzanne were.

I was standing in shock from what this girl told me when I saw that a Taxi
had dropped off a young girl & guy, on the sidewalk, by Planned Parenthood.
The death escort from Planned Parenthood, a old tart he is, came over to
them.  I decided to cross the street & go over to try to help them.  When I
arrived with the Truth packet & the rubberized 12 week old plastic baby I said to her "do you want to see the baby".  They then walked into Planed Parenthood with the death escort.  My heart sank.  A few minutes later they came out & I was hopeful, only for a very short time.  They walked down the street & I called over to John to give them the packet.  He finally did as they were returning to Planned Parenthood & the guy took it & the girl took it from him & threw it down on the sidewalk near Planned Parenthood, we retrieved it.  We aren't going to have our packets thrown away & wasted, for the nastiness of the victim or the victimizer.  I was upset for I was hopeful when I saw that they walked out of Planned Parenthood but my heart was in turmoil when I saw them come back & not open for the truth. Ruined young lives.  It's a heartbreak.

I saw from a distance a young woman & a young child around 3 years old, with a guy walk down the sidewalk.  I asked Martha if she would ask her if she needed anything at the center.  She brought them in for some real nice
things.  She told Martha that she was on the Depo Provera shot & hasn't had a period in 3 months & isn't pregnant.  Bad drug.....it also thins your bones too in making it very easy for a fracture to take place.  Many side effects & is also an abortificiant, which means that it takes the life of an already fertilized egg, which is a person.  No Bill O'Reilly, not a 'potential human being' but a real 'human being'.  Lets start to respect the person in the womb because we were all there at one time.

Suzanne was in the center calling are clients seeing if they needed anything & how they are doing.  Great news we just go in finding out that we are parents again.  One of our clients had a baby boy Lou, a few weeks ago, & both are doing very well.  Praise God!!  Our new mom needs a pac n play & we will get one for her.  This is so cool :)

Carole's little granddaughter who was born at 1 lb. 8oz. was with us on the
front lines in a picture that was framed.  We put it by the statue of the Blessed Mother.  Here Carole is praying that her little granddaughter will survive as Rachael Phelps, the abortionist at Planned Parenthood, is in there killing these precious babies, that God has just created.  How shameful.

Rose was busy in the Material Aid Room servicing our clients.  The room is
such a blessing to us & our clients & their children.  They are so happy when they come in & shop for free.

A mother brought her 2 young daughters into Planned Parenthood & when they came out the mother told me that they were in there for birth control.  I
was upset & I said to the mother "you are making your daughters into Planned Parenthood sex objects & they are going to be used by the men they have sex with. They will suffer with low self esteem & even might get Sexually Transmitted Diseases & even get pregnant & will you then bring them back here to kill your grandchild".  I was angry.  These mothers are wimps & they are destroying their daughter's lives.

Carole had just left when the girl that was disrespectful to Martha & was here with her girlfriend who was having her baby be killed.  I called over to them & said "where is your baby".  I was holding Malachi, the aborted baby at 21 weeks when they came out.  She rolled down the window & say things that were so vulgar & I will not repeat it here or anywhere else.  It was trashy talk.  She said yeah just show mw the signs & I'll get right in your face.  I then saw the death bracelet on her right arm.  I said "you have the death mark, you have the death mark".  She just kept on going on & on & the driver was getting onto the street so I took out my cell phone & I pretended to call the police.  They left quickly & that's what we wanted. We aren't going to be abused because that's what some of them do best. Sorry we are NOT your victims.  It did take Martha & I a little time to recover from this incident.  Their hell has just begun.  You can't kill an innocent baby & live a happy life.  THAT"S THE LIE THAT PP TELLS YOU IN ORDER FOR YOU TO HAVE AN ABORTION!  Don't buy their lie........ Please.

About 15 minutes later the two young kids that came in the Taxi walked out & I tried to talk to them as they walked up the sidewalk & she threw me the
'bird'.  They went into the alley way & about 5 minutes later they came out
& got into a Taxi.  As the cab drove by us I held the graphic sign & also was holding the statue of the Blessed Mother, to which she showed her ignorance again.  They feel some what guilty, when we are out there, for what they have just done, and they get mad at us.  We pray for them & their terrible lives, that they will seek out God's forgiveness & their child's, for what they did.  Taking a life is never the answer to your problems. Post abortion will only add to your problems in a different  & more horrible way.

Later on when the abortionist was leaving I said "were you busy making out the 'Death Certificates' of the babies that you just slaughtered here today?
As she was pulling out of the driveway, around 7pm, I said to her "your hysterectomy when you were 22 shouldn't have made you into a murder".  I had an hysterectomy, for endometriosis at 28, & I don't kill people.  What made her into an abortionist???  She was once a Pediatrician...

 

Tuesday, August 17, 2010 in front of Planned Parenthood

When we arrived after Mass the other team members went out to the front lines to set up.  I was left behind & when I was heading out the doorbell rang & I answered it.  There were two women & one young girl around 3 years old.  I asked if I could help them & the one woman who was obviously pregnant said to me " I need a letter from you to prove that I'm pregnant to give to the Department of Social Service Department".  "Come on in "I said".  I needed to do a pregnancy test even though she is pregnant in order to say that I did a pregnancy test & it was positive. I then told her that we were not a Medical facility bit to go to the St. Mary's Clinic for them to writ a letter stating that you are pregnant & your due date".  Poor lady, her husband had beaten her up & she showed me her bruises & he's in jail now.  That's where he should be.  She has a high risk pregnancy & no money & no food.  The next thing I did for her was to call the local Food Link for her to get food for her daughter & herself.  Thank God she had an apartment.  I gave her a brochure & told her to call Fidelis Care for insurance  http://www.fideliscare.org/.  Her sister-in-law is with her & is willing to help her out as much as she can.  She & our clients daughter were in the Material Aid Room shopping.  What a sweet little girl.  Rose was making our usual sandwiches & I asked her to make a sandwich for out hungry client & her daughter & sister-in-law.   They enjoyed the chicken sandwich, tortilla chips, cranberry juice & chocolate chip cookies, that Rob had brought in for our supper, later on.  I gave her other brochures & encouraged her to go to St. Mary's clinic & to Food Link, which she knew where it was & to call the 1-800 # at Fidelis Care.  Also I need to comment that 211 was also a help to our client.  This number can give you numbers of different things that you request, like food or shelters, etc..  As she was leaving she stopped & turned to me saying that she had gone to many places to get assistance but they all turned her down until she came to us at Focus.  Praise God for this remarkable comment, it did touch my heart.  We are so glad to be able to assist our girls, to give them a better life.  This case is frustrating, I hope that I will see her again.  I told her not to give up because the Lord is with her & her daughter.   She said that she won't.  I was happy to hear this.  

As I was inside the center, with Sandi & Rose, taking care of our client & working in the Material Aid Room, the rest of the team, Martha, Mary S., Donna, Carole, Rob & John, were out on the front lines.  As I was about to join them the doorbell rang & it was Martha with our first of nine customers for the Material Aid Room today.  We even had our chocolate chip cookies devoured by our last two girls that had driven out Planned Parenthood.  I asked them if they needed any help & that we had a pregnancy center right next to this big yellow building.  They said "yes we want to come over to your place".  I asked Martha is she would assist them & she said "okay".  When she came back out about 15 minutes later she said that they didn't want anything but just to look around & they spotted the chocolate chip cookies, that Rob had bought for our desert tonight, & devoured them in a matter of seconds, before Martha could do anything about it.  Either they were very hungry or just plan rude & aggressive.  Out the door that went, full as can be, with our desert.  That's not what we are all about girls, please come back when you really want our help, & please bring your own cookies next time.  We are not suckers.  We have a generous heart to help people in need. 
 
I brought a young girl into the Rose Room for a pregnancy test, which was negative & I did some teaching with her.  I told her that it might have been to early & for her to come back next week for a repeat test, if nothing had changed.  She was grateful.
 
Two young girls were walking up the street with their mother into Planned Parenthood covering their faces as they walked by us because of the graphic pictures.  They were in Planned Parenthood for a very short time & came out.  I asked then if they wanted a 'free' pregnancy test & to follow Martha for one.  They did & they were in the center t for about 10 minutes when I saw that one of the young girls was walking by herself down the street.  I though to myself that she was given the news that she was pregnant & was upset & left the center without the other 2 people.  Well the story goes was that she wasn't pregnant but didn't want to watch the Growth & Development video that Martha had put on.   Her mother & sister went into the Material Aid Room to get some things for a baby in the family.  Then they joined her outside.  I noticed that the two of them walked into Planned Parenthood & when they had come out the mother had called over to the daughter who was waiting for them down the street saying "I have some condoms for you"!  I went up to the mother & said "this is not the message that you want to give your daughter"!  Then she said that her daughter drinks to much & lets her guard down & the guys take advantage of her because she's good looking".  I said that she needs to stop drinking & to get her boundaries back.  It sounds like rape to me.  They get her drunk & have their way with her without her consent.  Mom you have to do better for her sake & her sister's sake too.  The mom was heart sick & was crying.  I said just trust in the Lord & do the right thing & He will see you & your family through.  She said "yes I'm a believer & I will trust in the power of the Lord".  Glory be to God!!  There is hope here & healing & change for this mother & her two daughters. 
 
The Planned Parenthood Death Escort was reading a book in the sunshine waiting for her next victim to arrive to devour.  We try for that not to happen.  When a car comes in we speak Truth to that person or persons, hoping the Truth will penetrate their souls & convict them, through the power of God, not to do the evil that they are planning to do.  Some, thank God, have turned around & went home or came into the Focus Center, to get the help that they needed, to keep their pregnancies going.  It's the most horrible place, on the face of the Earth, where they are massacring little babies, for $$$$.   
 
The Material Aid Room was buzzing today.  The word is getting out.  I was back in the center for a few minutes when a mom came in asking for size 5 diapers for her 9 month old son.  We were almost all out of diapers & we don't usually carry size 5 anyhow.  She then said that she needed some money for her Security Deposit for her rent.  I told her that we were a small pregnancy center & we don't give out money for Security Deposits.  I gave her our Referral List & told her to call a couple of numbers to see if they could possibly help her.  It's been so sad lately, for so many women & girls are coming into our center, who are so needy & we are so eager to get as many referral agency names & numbers that we can to give out to our clients for them to get the help that they need by the right agency.   My heart aches for our girls & their children & for their lives.  Making the wrong choices 'in life' can be devastating. 
 
John was writing more messages, on the sidewalk, with sidewalk chalk.  We just found out that a girl was walking by & she saw the Pregnancy Help number 1/800-395-HELP & took it down & called it.  She was guided to go to the EmbracingOptions Pregnancy Center, http://www.embracingoptions.org/ 
to get a 'free' pregnancy test & was counseled & loved by the staff there.  They took good care of her & she was blessed.  A turn around due to the love & kindness, that she received from the staff, all because of a little chalk on the sidewalk.  It was a message of hope & change. 
 
We had a nice surprise visit from one of our clients & her baby boy who was born April 2nd of this year.  She brought her girlfriend in with her.  They spent some time in the Material Aid Room to get some real nice things for the baby.  Then a nice girl was in the Material Aid Room & she said to me.  "Hello Miss Mary, do you remember me, my baby Michael is coming home tomorrow from the hospital, for he's been there for the last 6 months now, because he was born premature".  I said "yes I do remember you & I was trying to get a hold of you & your mother but the number wasn't a working number any longer".  "I had a crib for you but I couldn't reach you so I had to give it to someone else".  "Please come back next Thursday & I'll have a Pac in Play for you to take home for Michael & he can use it up to a year or more, it's better then a crib".  She said "that'll be great, I'll be back next Thursday to pick it up & thank you".  Off she went only for me to find out that when she had left our center she walked into Planned Parenthood.  She was in there for a long time & when she finally came out I approached her gently & said "they kill babies in there, you don't want to be in a place like that".  She said that it was for a check up.  Only God knows why she went into Planned Parenthood?  When I see her next Thursday I will talk to her some more & give her some literature to take with her along with the Pac in Play.  I worry about my girls.  They seem to think that Planned Parenthood is their friend but that is further from the Truth.  They destroy lives & we know it, that's for sure, from the stories that the girls come & tell us about.  I only wish that there would be a Class Action suit against them & they would 'CLOSE FOREVER", never to kill again or to ruin another girls life.
 
It was supper time!!  The table was set for Martha, Rob, John & myself.  I brought in a roasted chicken & roasted potatoes & Martha brought in a green salad & Rob brought in chocolate chip cookies, oh I almost forgot that were no more.....  We had a feast & great conversation & we reviewed over the afternoon's events.  We had just finished when all of a sudden there were a young couple walking into the All Purpose Room where we were having supper.  We looked surprised because we didn't hear the doorbell ring, but figured that the door was left a jar & anyone could come on in.  We were glad that it was this nice couple.  They were walking down the sidewalk when they saw our sing there on the sidewalk stating 'Free Children's Clothes' with any arrow pointing to our center.  She was pregnant, due around Christmas time, so they thought that they would come on in.  We were happy that they did.  The mom went into the Material did Room to pick out many nice things for her son & the father of the baby went into the All Purpose Room to talk to the guys.  Rob asked him if he wanted any chicken & potatoes & he said "sure".  So Rob fixed him a plate.  He was delighted.  After the mom was finished shopping she was asked if she wanted anything to eat & she said "yes, please".  So Rob fixed her a plate of what was left over of the chicken & potatoes & salad.  They were very happy & grateful, to say the least.  They were blessed with love, food & clothes tonight.  It did our hearts well too.  God supplies all our needs when we need it.  Amen to that. 
 
They had left & it was time to clean up to get ready for the '40 Days for Life' meeting.  Rick wasn't going to be there tonight but he dropped off some fliers & brochures for me to hand out.  The doorbell started to ring.  We had a good turn out & a great meeting.  It's always good having pro life friends around.  We ended the meeting around 8pm & Martha, John & Rob left.  I immediately went on to the computer & emailed the gang to ask for diapers & formula & non perishable food for our food shelves.  SOS I said.  We were whiped out today, which is a good thing. 

 

 

 

The Story of Baby Douglas

  
Only God knows my real name…one He’s given just to me. He calls me “His Little Lamb.”I was conceived in January of 1936. I know my mother loved me. I lived and grew under her heart. I didn’t get to know my father. Did he ever touch Mommy’s belly and feel me move inside her?  I lived for four months in my little cocoon. Something happened. I stopped living. There must have been sadness that day.  I ended up in a Mason jar in a doctor’s office. I was the perfect specimen of a 4-month gestation baby. They say I was perfect in every way – even down to my tiny fingernails. Perfect, but not alive.  So many, many years I stayed with this doctor. He got old and sold his practice to a younger doctor. I came as part of the deal. When this second doctor, got old and died, his son sold the contents of his house to a very nice couple. They found me in the basement, way back in the cobwebs, up on a shelf. They were shocked and asked the son, “What is this?” The son said, “Oh that thing…I used to take it to school for show and tell.” The nice couple, Dennis and Mary Frances Westfall, were shocked and very touched to find me. They adopted me, and brought me home to look after me. They named me baby Douglas. When the new priest in town came to bless their home, they explained their unusual situation to him. They wanted very much to give me a proper burial. Fr. Joe Catanise said he’d be honored to do this and the funeral plans were set into motion. First, I needed to be visited by the Sheriff’s Department. They wanted to know all kinds of things about where I came from. And the Coroner’s Office was quite curious, as well. My adopted parents were reluctant to part with me, they had come to love me so much, but they entrusted me to Fr. Joe’s good care, and I stayed a short while with him at St. Leo Church. Then I traveled to the Burger Funeral Home in town where I stayed until the day of the funeral. Mr. Burger was very gentle with me.  Two very nice ladies from St. Leo’s who are in charge of Pledge for Life, Patty Buskey and Anna Summa, made all the arrangements for my funeral to be open to the public as a way of offering closure to those who lost a child to miscarriage or abortion. Anna got me a pretty blanket to be wrapped in. It’s very soft and cuddly. The day of my funeral, June 5, 2010, some 74 years after I was conceived, was very special to many people…and to me. Nobody that attended my funeral really knew me. But there were 116 people who came to say good-bye to me. To pray for me and for all babies lost to miscarriage or abortion.  Fr. Joe knew early on whom the perfect priest would be to give the homily at my funeral. Fr. Anthony Mugavero, from Holy Apostles Church in Rochester, came to speak on my behalf – to help all people who had lost someone to miscarriage or abortion, to help heal their wounds. Some never had the chance to remember their lost child in a Mass. So my funeral Mass was really also for all of them. It was called a Mass for the Unborn. Anna and Patty advertised my funeral and invited all those who had lost a child in this way. It was an opportunity for them to find closure. My funeral Mass began with pretty flowers at the altar, and I was in a simple, but beautiful little white casket. I was wrapped snugly in my soft little blanket. I was right up front. And there were two soldiers in fancy hats and capes and carrying swords, as a sort of honor guard for me. They were called Knights of Columbus. It made me feel very special. The music was so moving. The St. Leo Resurrection Choir sang beautifully and led everyone in the hymns chosen just for me. I waited so long for this. To think that the Music Director, Patty Gorman, who had lost a baby many years ago, played so lovingly for me. It must have been very sad for her. She sounded like an angel.  Mr. Burger printed up prayer cards for me and he and Fr. Joe were of the same mind; they gave me my middle name – Leo. It’s perfect - Douglas Leo, as in St. Leo the Great, who was a very brave saint.  Fr. Mugavero spoke so beautifully about love, and that every child is a gift of God. How life is so precious, whether born or unborn. His words were so gentle and kind. He sang the words from a song by a singer named John Denver. “I want to live, I want to grow, I want to see, and I want to know, I want to share what I could give, I want to be, I want to live….” That says everything I would want to say. What could I have become if my life was allowed to develop?  But my coming to being, however short that time was, had a purpose - if for no other reason but to be found and be loved enough to be honored by this funeral. My existence was to help those, who have lost their dear babies, to have closure. I’m proud of that. The folks from Burger Funeral Home found a perfect place for me to rest in the Parma Union Cemetery. The good people who are in charge of the cemetery donated my special place. It’s next to a little girl who was born one year after I was conceived. She lived for six days. I think we will be good friends. I overheard someone at my new home say this funeral helped her have closure for a child she lost. I’m happy for that. Every life, no matter how well lived, matters to our God. He never forgets His creations. He had a purpose for my life, as short as it was. If I have helped one person by my short existence, I have not lived in vain. God bless all the babies. And thank you.

 I’m at peace.  Baby Douglas Leo 

Those of us who attended Douglas Leo’s funeral Mass want him to have a proper headstone. If you have been touched by this story of his little life and his very large impact on others, please consider contributing to his headstone. Donations would be gratefully accepted at St. Leo Church, PO Box 725, 167 Lake Avenue, Hilton NY 14468.  Thank you, Betty Murphy.

  

Please check out this video:

Violence At Rockford's Abortion Mill

http://prolifecorner.com/node/413

 

Wednesday, August 18, 2010 in front of Planned Parenthood

It was Martha, Carole, Maria, John & I, out on the front lines, this afternoon, Tucker comes at 4pm & Rose was in the center.  The first thing that happened was that we got a delivery.  A mother, we had helped out at one time, was returning the favor & had brought us 2 used car seats, which we can use for it is a blessing because we have had to throw away so many cars seats, in the past. Even though they look fine if they are out of date, according to the bottom of the seat, we can't give them away.  It can only be used for 6 years after the date purchased.  What a bummer in some cases but we take no chances & throw out the old & pray for some new ones to come in to give to our mothers, for their children, to be safe in a car.  We have them sign a Liability Form, to protect the Focus Pregnancy Help Center.  We were so grateful to her for her kindness to the center & to our clients in need.  God bless her & her sweet child who she brought with her, he was sooo cute.  Just then the doorbell rings & it was Jim with a whole bunch of baby clothes & diapers & formula.  Thanks so much Jim.  He even said to me that if we ever run out to call him & he will buy some diapers & formula ASAP .  Thanks Bill!  What a team of dedicated pro lifers.  Later on in the day I got a phone call from Michael saying that he was headed over to give us bags of diapers & baby wipes & formula.  God is good.  God does supply our needs so quickly through such great people.  Mike came about an hour later with bags of supplies that I requested the day before that he had gotten at Wegnams.  They have a $5 off coupon, on their diapers, which are $5.99 so you end up paying $.99 for the package of diapers, until September 24th..  What a fantastic deal.  I plan to go shopping tomorrow. 

 I just found out that we will be blessed again with having the students from the Elim Bible Institute come again this year, during the school year, to work & pray & gain some experience at the Focus Center.  This is great news!! 
 
Martha brought some of the girls into the Material Aid Room to be assisted by Rose in getting some very nice things that we are blessed with.  Thank you all who contribute to the Material Aid Room, in making it be filled with so many nice things for all to receive.  God bless you!! 
 

I was now standing out on the front lines when a woman, from across the street walking her dog, lit at me light a match.  She started to scream at me saying "you're not saving anyone doing what you're doing showing those pictures".  "Oh yes we have, though the grace of God, as of now we aware of 40 babies saved from being killed by abortion & why aren't you mad at Planned Parenthood that is doing the killing"?  "We're trying to save lives".  I asked her if she had an abortion in the past.  So many post abortive woman are so angry & they lash out at us all the time especially driving by.  She just walked in a huff to her car in the vets parking lot. 

Two police officers, on bikes, were on the corner, talking & waiting until this altercation with this woman was over.  Thanks guys!  

 

 

Thursday & Sunday, August 19th. & 22nd., 2010 

It was Martha, Bill, John & I out on the front lines today & Rose & Deanna in the center.  Suzanne was out of the office today with another commitment so Deanna was there today working in the office, calling our pregnant clients to see how they were doing & to see if they needed anything that we could help them with.  She had just a few girls &all were well with them & then she called our another client & out came 'the can of worms'.  She needed food for herself & her 2 year old daughter.  Well this was not an easy task but informative, to say the least.  We called some the Food Pantries & found out that most of them need referrals & several ID's, for proof of person, etc..  Wow!  She thought that she would have enough food for the weekend & after that her Food Stamps would kick in.  We don't want to make our clients dependent on us, we want them to learn to be self sufficient, so we act as a intermittent care facility, for just a short time before they can get assistance for a longer time.  We are a there for them in a pinch, I should say.  We learned about the system with this one call to our client.   Deanna made out a Referral Sheet to have on hand for clients that come in & need to go to a Food Pantry so she will have it in her hands to give to them, without any problems to quick & ready service.  We want the best for our clients who we hold in our hearts & prayers.

I went back outside to be with the team only to see that the Death Escort was ready for her next victim to devour.  Not on my watch dearie.  I read Planned Parenthood's newsletter called, 'Informed Choice'. You hypocrites!  Your only choice is death, you make no money when lives are saved.  You've pushed us pro lifers 80 feet away from the Planned Parenthood's door so that the people going in there won't hear or get the Truth.  We pro lifers are out there speaking the Truth & giving literature packets, of the Truth, it's just a bit far away.  You don't want to lose any customers....you just want to ruin lives!!!!  We want to to save & restore lives!!! 

I went back outside to be with the team only to see that the Death Escort was ready for her next victim to devour.  Not on my watch dearie.  I read in the Planned Parenthood newsletter called, 'Informed Choice'.  You hypocrites!  Your only choice is 'death' you make no money when lives are 'saved'.  You've pushed us pro lifers, 80 feet away from the door, so that the people going in there won't hear or get the Truth to change their minds.  That's your 'informed choice'?  You ruin lives & souls at Planned Parenthood.  After their 'choice for death' the first reaction is usually relief then when time goes on this turns to pain, shame, grief & guilt.  That's what you do to the women & girls that you deceive. 

I also read, in you so called 'Informed Choice' newsletter, that a volunteer with your Rape Crisis is a pagan & a witch.  What a 'good witch', is this the Wizard of Oz??  No thank you. The thought of having her at my bedside, if a violent crime had just taken place, would be a double trauma.  I would want a good pro life woman to be there instead, who loves God & life.  Please check out: http://www.childpredators.com/.

The abortionist, Rachael Phelps, wasn't at Planned Parenthood, this week, killing little babies, thank God. I just received this email on Sunday from a friend in Syracuse. I just found Rachael Phelps,she was in Syracuse, doing her evil there. 

This was printed in the Syracuse.Com http://www.syracuse.com/. 

Please read it and weep:

Medication abortion can save lives of women.

To the Editor:

Medication abortion has been a safe and legal option for women in the United States for almost 10 years. Virginia Black, in her Aug. 12 letter, suggested medication abortion is not safe. However, as can happen when non-medical people try to address medical issues, she does not have all the facts. Medication abortion is a safe option for many women with risks similar to miscarriage.

However, the Nicholas Kristof column, referenced by Black, specifically addressed the impact of medication abortion in developing countries. Unsafe abortion is one of the leading causes of maternal death and illness around the world. It is also one of the most preventable. More than 19 million unsafe abortions take place each year, and 95 percent occur in poor countries.

What Black overlooked was the context of Kristof’s column, in which he stated that Misoprostol “pills are beginning to revolutionize abortion around the world, especially in poor countries (where) one result may be tens of thousands of women’s lives saved each year.”

Black calls the use of abortion pills in developing countries “shocking,” but what is truly shocking is the 70,000 women who die and the almost a quarter of a million children who are orphaned each year from unsafe abortion that could be prevented with access to safe health services like medication abortion. If medication abortion can help, that is a step forward!

Dr. Rachael Phelps
Associate medical director, Planned Parenthood of the Rochester/Syracuse Region

Dr. Rachael Phelps (left), an alumna of the Family Planning Fellowship. Dr. Emily Godfrey (right),whose specialty is family medicine, with a patient undergoing a routine checkup.

New York Times Article

http://www.nytimes.com/2010/07/18/magazine/18abortion-t.html?_r=1&pagewanted=all

Tuesday, August 24, 2010 in front of Planned Parenthood

When you think that you have experienced the worst of the worst you find out that you were wrong. The behavior & language out there today was unbelievable. I know that I'm at the most evil place on the face of the Earth, where that murder people, so what do I expect? I always hope for the best but I'm not going to get it at an abortion mill, really. 

When I arrived at the center there was Martha, Beverly & John there.  Mary S., Donna, Carole, Carmen & Rob followed.  Sandy was in the center & Rose was not coming in today.  We'll see her tomorrow.  Melody came in later to work in the center. 

I finally got to the front lines only to hear that Planned Parenthood's ground keeper was giving us trouble about the buffer zone's, 15 feet restriction, which is Unconstitutional, to say the least!!  He was told by Planned Parenthood that it was 25 feet so he painted a 'yellow line' 25 feet from the entrance & is bugging us about it.  We measured 15 feet & put a 'black line' down to show the true distance that we can stand, in front of Planned Parenthood's Killing Mill.  Wow, what a lie they told him!  I wish that I could find a good Attorney to work on this case to get us our Constitutional rights back.  Rob had the Injunction papers with him & he showed this employee the paper work.  He said that he has been working for Planned Parenthood since 1994 & he has three children, who he has to feed.  I think  they're probably are all grown up by now, so don't give us this nonsense.  Get a job that you're not paid in Blood Money, sir.  He said that he was a Christian & he was wearing a cross around his neck.  Hear we go again!!  Christians that betray Christ & work in a place that kills His precious children!!  Go figure!  This Injunction Appeal in 2002, brings back bad memories, though it was well worth it to save lives.  We did win this appeals case in 2002, from the Injunction Case that we lost, in Buffalo's Federal Court in 1999.  Check it out: http://caselaw.lp.findlaw.com/scripts/getcase.pl?navby=search&case=/data2/circs/2nd/009076.html.  Lots of reading with this appeal decision.  God protected us pro lifers, from this gross injustice, when we were trying to save lives of precious babies & their mothers, at Planned  Parenthood.  Thank you Lord.  Amen. 

A van came into Planned Parenthood with an older woman driving it.  I called out to her that she was driving into a Killing Mill & that we could help the girl that was with her.  But to no avail for they got out of their car & went into Planned Parenthood.  When she came out, about 20 minutes later, she said to me "shut up you --------- we're not here for an abortion".  I was shocked that an elderly woman would talk to another person that way, & one who was trying to help her family.  I said " why would you trust murders"?  I was upset to say the least.  Then all of a sudden a woman, who must have been lying down in the front seat, appeared out of no where & said to me " don't talk to my grandmother like that or I'll get out of the car & punch you in the face".  I guess it's 911 time.  So I got my phone out of my pocket & pretended to call 911.  The oh so sweet grandmother said to me "do you want my license number"?  So co operative you are!  I said "that won't be necessary, for I'll just look on your license plate for the number, thank you".  Well, off they went in 6 seconds to wherever.  This tactic usually works every time.  It's used to get rid of nasty people in a hurry before there is any incident, on their part.  When she came back, about a half hour later, to pick up her other granddaughter, she said to me "what don't you speak a litter louder, so I said back to her "okay, & by the way, we love you".  After she picked up her other granddaughter, on the way out, she gave me the 'bird', you go Granny, you give the elderly a bad name.  Ick!!

We had many young girls come in for baby & children clothes & the Material Aid Room was so busy. We also had drop off of food & diapers for our moms. It is so heartwarming when we see our moms so happy with what they just received. God is Great!!  

I was on the front lines with 7 pro lifers & it was difficult seeing the cars go into Planned Parenthood getting ready to have their precious baby killed by the abortionist Rachael Phelps.  It's like being in a continual nightmare standing near a building that is killing small babies (people (human beings) in the womb) one right after another.  How Evil & disheartening.  It's like being on the front lines of war seeing people get killed & there's nothing that you can do to stop it, only trying to defend those who are on the ground.  We call out to the mothers offering them help & love & a future but some of them just want to go in there to get 'unpregnant' again, in matter of minutes, rather than months when they can bring forth another human being, created by God, to live on planet Earth & to have a life & be productive here.  When they drive out of the Killing Mill I usually say "I hope that you didn't have your baby killed here today, if you did I pray that you repent for the sin of murder".  I then get sworn at & the finger.  Their hell has just begun.  We can only pray that they will ask God to forgive them, He will. 

 
After being out on the front lines we came into the center to do some things & to get ready for our supper.  I brought a eggplant lasagna, garlic bread & chocolate covered brownies with walnuts. Martha & Janet' brought a nice salad & we had our favorite drink Cranberry juice.  We hurried to eat all this food & to get ready for the '40 Days for Life' meeting which was a good turn out of dedicated people.  It was a great meeting with a lot accomplished.  Went home late. 

 

Wednesday, August 25, 2010 in front of Planned Parenthood

I was walking to church this noon with John & I heard a guy on his cell phone say a very nasty word.  I turned around & told him that there was a Church here & for him to watch his mouth.  He said "it's your Church, not mine".  I then said "this is where God reigns".  He then said, in such a rude tone of voice, "mind your own business" & he said it several times, as I was walking up the stairs, to the Church where Father was celebrating Mass.  I thought later that it was my business to speak Truth to him no matter if he liked it or not.  One of the gifts of the Holy Spirit is Holy Boldness, just trust in the Lord for it.  We must correct in love that's a Corporal Work of Mercy.  We are responsible to correct those who are misguided for their repentance & renewal.  The Holy Sprit was a working on him, for a 'seed' was planted, in his soul.  After Mass John, Martha & I went to the center where Ryan & Ryan & Carole came a little while later, to witness the Truth.  Rose was now back in the center to work hard & make great sandwiches for us, for lunch.    
 
Yesterday the Landscaper got in our faces about where to stand on the sidewalk.  He was told by Planned Parenthood to paint a yellow line 25 feet from the entrance of the driveway, which is wrong.  Yesterday Rob tried to explain to him & he showed him the 2002 Injunction, that said where we can stand, so we hope that he understood what Rob was saying & to leave us alone from now on.  About 2 hours later the police drove into Planned Parenthood & went in. He went into the front door only then to go into the side door & come out.  I had my Injunction papers ready for him but he didn't stop & he left, never to return again.  Yeah :) 
 
I was walking out of the center to go onto the sidewalk when I saw one of our graphic signs next to the tree in front of our nemesis, Buckpitt, which is a business right next to Planned Parenthood.  They have resented us being in front of their business, for the last 8 years, when we won the appeal.  Get over it guys for this is where the Judge said we could be.  Please take it up with the Federal Court so that we can be right in front of Planned Parenthood, to talk to the girls as they are going into that death trap.  Well, as I was walking over to the tree to get the sign to put it closer to us near the other tree that we stand beside, the guy from Buckpitt, who was painting the building said "I don't want that there".  I turned around at him & said in a stern voice "it doesn't matter what you want it's not your tree, not because you said so I'm moving the sign closer to us here on the front lines".  He answered back "your very angry".  I said back to him "oh yes I am, they're killing babies at Planned Parenthood & all you do is give us trouble all the time".  I then walked away with our precious sign of a mutilated baby that was murdered by abortion.  What is the matter with these people?  Why don't they care?  Later on I went over to him & said that if ever you want to talk to me I'd be more than glad to set something up.  He never replied & I walked away.  I'm trying to get along with these people.  Lord help me!! 
 
I got a call on my cell phone asking for a pregnancy test.  She didn't live very far away & she said that she would be over in 20 minutes.  When she arrived with her boyfriend, Martha lead them into the Rose Room for the pregnancy test & for counseling.  In the meantime I had given a pregnancy test & counseled one young girl earlier.  We gave away many baby & children's clothes today too.  Rose was very busy. 

  

Thursday, 26, 2010 in front of Planned Parenthood

There was John & I who opened up the center & right behind us was a young mom with her son in a stroller.  Deanna just came with her niece, who is 7 years old, she was baby-sitting her today at Focus, what a joy she is.  I asked her if she could assist this mother with her son in the Material Aid Room, she said that she would.  I asked John if he would start to get the signs & things out onto the front lines to start to counsel the girls & guys going into the Killing Mill.  Tony, Deanna's father, helped John set up on the sidewalk.  Rose just came in & I had some assignments for her to do, which she quickly started.  Frank came in to look over the Conference Room, which we might rent out, to start painting tomorrow morning.  Can't wait.  Should look great when finished & then we have to ask out Landlord to put in a nice & durable rug in for us.  This room should be great!!  Thank you Lord for this  Conference Room, an unexpected surprise, to advance our center's work. 

I got a call on my cell phone and a client came in for a pregnancy test.  Martha counseled her in the Rose Room.  Deanna was kept busy doing paper work & organizing & Suzanne was busy calling our clients to see how they were doing & to see if they needed anything.  She got through to some clients but some phone numbers were disconnected, when that happens we send out a letter.  We want to make sure, if possible, to connect with our clients.

Outside we were plagued with a swarm of bees which Martha is deadly allergic to.  Scary!!  We had to make sure that the bees were not around Martha.  It was hot & our 'corn man' came again to drop off a full bag of corn from the Public Market.  All Summer long I have not been able to see him, for when he comes I've been in the center.  Darn!  I do hope that I get to see him at least once before the Fall to thank him for all the great corn all Summer long.  God bless this man. 

A young woman was looking at us from across the street & I noticed that she was preparing to cross over the street to us.  I say a quick prayer that all will go well. She approached us & was pleasant.  She was for 'life' & not for 'death' for these little innocent little babies.  We all agreed that abortion was evil & that it took a life of a human being.  All was going well until I just mentioned that the Peace Sign that she was wearing on her hat was really an inverted cross.  There I lost her.  She became defensive & said that someone else had told her that too but until God tells her she won't believe it.  I told her that God just did tell you, for He speaks to us through one another.  She saw that we had a statue of the Blessed Mother out there on the front lines, on a table.  She walked over to the statue & said that's Mother Mary & that we were worshipping her.  We said no we are not, we are honoring her, because she is the Mother of God.  She became more uncomfortable & then walked away.  For her to recognize the statue as Mother Mary, we think that she was an ex-Catholic. People who leave the Catholic Church are so hard to witness to.  We hold her in our hearts & hope that she comes back to the One True Catholic Church, founded by Christ, 2,000 years ago.  We love people of all faiths.

There were people who were very supportive of our street ministry & gave us support.  When some one is attacking us verbally some one will drive by & holler out their window "keep up the great work that you're doing".  Yea, we will & thank you for your love & support we certainly need it. 

Deanna was bring out paper work for me to sign & to send out.  She has been such a blessing to us this Summer.  She'll be going back to England to continue her ministry there.  What a Christian!  The Lord sends us people when we need then & I praise Him for it.  We are growing as a ministry & as a center.  We will be having our second Mass at the center next Wednesday evening, celebrating our 5th. year Anniversary on the Birthday of the Blessed Virgin Mary.  Yeah!!  Happy Birthday Mother Mary... & Happy Birthday to the Focus Center.  Time flies, that's for sure.

Friday, August 27, 2010 at the Focus Center 

Earlier this week I had called my landlord to the Focus Center to ask him if we could use the Great Room, which is empty & available to rent out, for our '40 Days for Life' rally on September 21st..  He said "sure you can use for nothing but I want you to have the room".  "What" I said, "what do you mean"?  He said I believe in what you're doing & I'm used to you & I really don't want to rent to strangers, so I'll give you the room for $800 plus the three rooms that you're renting now for $1,000".  I said "Bernie I don't know if I can do it, that's $1,800 a month"?  "Sure you can Mary just pray about it".  I said Bernie the Lord wants to hear from you".  He's an agnostic.  I said "I'll have to notify the Board first & can we paint the room".  "Sure & I'll put down new carpeting too".  Oh Lord what are you up to?  I notified the Board & all said "yes' to this new adventure & advancement of the Focus Center.  So Martha asked her ex husband to paint for us & he said that her would.  So we picked out the colors, a salmon, for the 2 accent walls, then the main walls a creamy beige. Should look real nice...

I was headed over to the center on Friday morning to help out & to get Frank lunch for his service.  When I arrived I saw the Planned Parenthood's landscaper, on his knees, scrubbing off the yellow line, which was a correct line for the unconstitutional buffer zone, by the tree.  I briskly walked over to him & said "what are you doing scrubbing the correct yellow line & wiping off our pregnancy help line in sidewalk chalk. what is the matter with you".  He stood up & pointed the can of acetone right in my face & I pushed his arm away from my face.  If he would have sprayed my face & would have called the police & had him arrested.  I said you're working for those people that kill children & I pointed to the abortionist car that was parked in the parking lot, I pointed to it & said "she kills little babies".  I said that you're wearing your cross under your shirt, it will burn a hole in you, please get out of here".  He left in a huff.  So he scrubbed off the real 'Buffer Zone' yellow line that we measured 15 feet.  "It's fine with me" I told him, now there isn't a yellow line.  Duh!  We finally notified our Attorney & she will write a letter to Planned Parenthood to set them straight about where the 'yellow line' should be.  It really doesn't matter because the good Lord s working miracles out there all the time no matter how far away we have to stand.  For the Lord has no boundaries, do I hear an Amen.. 

I walked back into the center to see how Frank was doing, he's a fast painter & he's doing a great job!  Thanks Frank.  Just then the doorbell rang & it was three young girls.  They asked if they could get a pregnancy test, all three of the girls.  Okay girls 'come follow me'.  After I ministered to them they went into the Material Aid Room to get some clothes for their children at home & the little one that was with them.  They were very happy & so was I.  For all three girls were negative.  I wanted to go to Church & to Confession before Mass started so I hurried now to go.  When I arrived at Church there was a line & I was hoping to make it into the Confessional, which I did.  When I was waiting in line the front door opened & there was Martha coming into the Church, I was so surprised.  Thank you Lord for I sure need her today.  How He provides.  After Mass we went over to the Pizza place on the corner to get lunch for Frank, Martha & I.  Tuna supreme subs, yummy.  When we arrived at the center we all ate our lunch & then back to work we went.  Frank finished the accent walls & was coming back on Monday to start the other walls.  Great job he's doing.  Martha & I decided to go over to the Woman's Care Center to get the baby & children clothes & baby food that they had for us.  How nice that they're sharing their plenty with us.  They help us & we help them, it's called team work.  Before we left the doorbell rang & it was a young girl asking for a pregnancy test, & she had her boyfriend with her. We ministered to her & she had a 9 year son so I sent her into the Material Aid Room to get what she needed for him.  Nice couple. 

Before we were going to the Woman's Care Center we went over to one of our client's house to give her a paper that she needed for DSS, unfortunately we just missed her.  I called her on her cell phone & she will stop by the center next Tuesday to pick it up.  Now off to the Woman's Care Center.  We were blessed there with many nice things for our center & also lots of literature that we needed & they had.  I was very greedy & I told them so.  They asked if I needed a bag I said "sure" with my head down.  Oh well, you take the opportunity when it's before you.  Right!  They were very helpful with so many things & I will be kept busy, making phone calls... all to better the Focus Center.  I will be calling for 'free' bibles & for Excellus Blue Cross/ Blue Shield brochures for the center.   I'll put them right next to Fidelis Care.  Then our clients can have a choice with their Health Insurance coverage plan.  That will be good for their bodies & the Bibles will be good for their souls.  Martha & I thanked our friends & off we went to the next stop.  The bank!  I needed to deposit all our checks, that we were blessed with, for our work at Focus.  What a blessing our benefactors are to us... God bless them all.  Our next stop was to go to Wegmans Grocery Store, to clip coupons for a great deal on baby diapers & baby wipes, for our clients.  We got at least 5 bags of diapers & 5 packages of wipes. The center needs these items & baby formula the most, then the baby clothes & children clothes & small items.  We are supplied for a while due to all the great people that dropped off these items when I recently sent out an SOS email, for these   items.  The response was fantastic!!  Love you guys :)

Next stop was supper, my treat Martha!!!  

 

Monday, August 30, 2010 at the Focus Center

I went to the center today to see hoe Frank was coming along with the painting & t get him lunch after Mass at noon.  When I arrived he was already done with the big wall & he said that he will return to do the largest wall tomorrow.  He showed my some wires on the wall & later on I called the landlord to see if he could check to see if they are alive or dead wires.  Always something of a challenge.  The landlord said that he will stop by tomorrow with his testing kit to see what is going on.  I don't want a fire in there that's for sure.  We have no smoke alarms but we do have an Fire Extinguisher, at least.  I think that we should have both for we have a lot of people in the building.  I don't want anyone to get hurt or killed.  I'm surprised that the City Inspectors didn't catch that he doesn't have any smoke alarms in the building.  Oh brother...
 

As I was talking to Frank, asking him what he wanted for lunch, the doorbell rang.  I went to the door & there was  a young girl.  I asked if I could help her & she said that she needed a pregnancy test.  I was headed to church early for my Holy Hour but I new that the dear Lord had sent her to me to take care of.  I did.  She took the test & I counseled her in how to act & to dress more modestly.  She said that she has a 1 year old sister & I said that we had some nice things in the Material Aid Room for her to get for her sister.  Then the doorbell rang again & I walked to the door seeing that there was 2 women & 6 children.  I almost fainted for I knew that this was going to be a challenge & it was.  I lead them into the Material Aid Room & then went back to finish up with the client. I'm not nor anyone else is here on Mondays or Fridays, in the morning, so it was Providential, that I was hear today to take care of these people.  When I came back into the Material Ad Room I saw that one of the women had taken all 7 dresses off of the wall that were hanging there & she was putting them in her bag.  I quickly said to her that we need to save some dresses for our other clients that she could take two.  She said that the other girl said that we could take as much as we wanted.  "Oh yes" I said but that's within reason.  She said that the other woman that was with her had 8 children & she had 4, with a little girl on her way.   All the kids were dumping things on the floor & making such a mess.  I said to her that if you were at K- Mart right now shopping you wouldn't let your children do what they're doing in here.  She said something in Spanish & they calmed down a bit.  I went back to the counseling room & told the client that just took a pregnancy test to come on into the Material Ad Room to get something's for her sister. She got in there & got some nice things.  She forgot her Truth packet that I gave her in the Rose Room so I will send it to her in the mail.  After everyone had left I did some more work in the center & then left to go to the noon Mass downtown & after that I went to get my car inspected. I made it by 2 days. To close for  comfort.  It's a $75 ticket.  Not good..... 

The sidewalk counselor who is on Monday evenings called me to say that he & Pat, our counselor in the center, were very busy handing out baby & children's clothes. What a day!  Thank you Lord for your goodness & grace.

 

 
Tuesday, August 31, 2010 in front of Planned Parenthood
 
Martha & John went to get subs for our lunch & also for Frank who is painting out new Event Room, that we were just blessed with, by God.  I went to the center to get started by myself & I thought that Sandy & Rose were coming to help me but they both called in.  Now I know how an employer feels.  I do appreciate all that our volunteers do, for the work at the Focus Center, I do depend on them so much.  I hope & pray that they both feel better soon.  Love ya!  So I just prayed to God that I could get things done to get ready to go to the front lines soon to defend life.  Jerry came & set up the signs outside & started to pray on his knees across the street from Planned Parenthood.  Martha & John & Rob arrived soon after.  Carole came a little later & set up more signs & was a witness to the people going in & out of Planned Parenthood & the cars driving by us.  Donna came around 2pm instead of 1pm, she said that she slept in, which is okay, she deserves to.  What a dedicated team of pro lifers that come on Tuesdays, Wednesdays & Thursdays  to 'defend life'.  Martha didn't come right out because she was kept busy in the Material Aid Room helping our clients.  One of the moms said that she was told by the Salvation Army that she could get free diapers & formula at our center.  Wow!  A couple of days ago I had stopped at a red light & was heading to the center when I rolled down my window to give a mom with a baby in a stroller our brochure.  She said "oh, I've heard of you before, thanks".  Wow!  God is Great & we are so happy to be able to help people in the Community temporarily with their needs. 
 

John & I were on one side of Planned Parenthood using the mega phone & Rob was on the other side of Planned Parenthood using the mega phone & Jerry, Martha & Carole were across the street from Planned Parenthood witness for 'life'.  We had them surrounded.  We were praying & witnessing the Truth.  Many car that drove by surprised us by honking we also had a few people that gave us the 'bird', which means that they are guilty of something.  We pray that they 'repent' before they die. 

A man, in a truck, drove into the parking lot & was delivering something to Planned Parenthood.  We called over to him to tell him what they do in there to little babies but the Death Escort, Silvia Rose, went over to him to greet him.  I was holding the precious aborted baby sign Malachi when he drove out & he gave me the finger.  I know that he is a Post Abortive Dad.  How sad!!  No one in their right mind would give their finger to a female holding a sign of an innocent aborted baby, if they themselves weren't involved in an abortion.  Please check out: http://ramahinternational.org/who-affected-abortion.html & http://ramahinternational.org/for-post-abortive-men.html & http://www.leaderu.com/orgs/tul/pap1.html &  http://www.menandabortion.info/.

I was still across the street when an angry woman got out of her car & came over to me saying "do you know why I'm here".  I answered her back saying "they kill babies in there", I knew in my heart what she was about to say next.  "I'm here for rape counseling".  I said to her that I was gang raped & I wouldn't come her for counseling because they kill babies in there".  Then she pulled up her dress to show mw her butt.  I guess this was her statement to me that she didn't care.  Maybe she had gotten pregnant from the rape & she had an abortion?  I don't know but I crossed over the street to tell that she could get her dignity back by going to a real & caring counselor & that she deserved that.  She walked into Planned Parenthood to get re victimized again by people that work in a place that kills little babies.  I wouldn't trust them that's for sure!!  Please check out: http://www.boundless.org/regulars/kaufman/a0000848.html & http://www.priestsforlife.org/articles/rapeandabortion.html & http://www.lifenews.com/nat6223.html.

 

Wednesday, September 1, 2010 in front of Planned Parenthood

It was a good day because the abortionist, at Planned Parenthood, doesn't kill babies there on Wednesdays, which is a good thing.  There is nothing that makes me more happy than a baby not being killed by abortion.  I gave a pregnancy test to a girl that had been taking the Depo Provera shot & was very upset that she was having very serve side effects from the shot.  Check out: http://www.all.org/article.php?id=10133 & http://www.prolife.com/BIRTHCNT.html.  I encouraged her to go see her doctor for a mammogram for the lumps that she said that she discovered in her breasts.  She regrets that she ever took the shots.  "That messed me up", she said. She took the pregnancy test & the Truth packet with lots of information in it & some children's clothes for her 2 & 4 year old sons.  She was very grateful for all that she had learned today at Focus. The bible says "that you shall KNOW the Truth & the Truth shall set you free".
 
After I saw her two more ladies came in for baby & children clothes. The one girl had twin girls who were 2 years old & her sister, who just found out at Planned Parenthood, that she was pregnant.  She was so very happy & was not abortion minded at all.  She escaped their agenda of 'death' for her little baby.  I gave them the Growth & Development DVD & the Maafia 21: Black Genocide in the 21st. Century DVD to educate them.  I had a pocket New Testament on the table, as I counseled them in the Rose Room, & one of the girls took it.  Happy & blessed reading to you my dear.  After they left, about an hour later a mother & her pregnant daughter came into the center for baby & children's clothes.  The mom had 7 children, 6 girls & 1boy.  She came into get some clothes for her family & for her new grand baby, who is 16 weeks old, in her daughter's womb.  The new mom took some baby blankets & some other things, for she doesn't know if she's going to have a little boy or girl, at this time.  She said that she was going next week for an ultrasound that will determine the sex of the baby.  I told her that when she finds out that she can come back for baby clothes, at that time.  It was a great moment  celebrating 'life' of our past 2 clients.  Very refreshing helping these new moms, rather than them going into Planned Parenthood, to have their precious babies be murdered by Rachael Phelps, the abortionist there.  It's like night & day. 

Martha, John & Maria were outside witnessing with Carole & Rose in the center putting away baby & children clothes that we had just received from our benefactors.  Busy afternoon.  Just then the doorbell rang & it was Nancy from Excellus Blue Cross/ Blue Shield at the door.  I had called for some information & brochures to be given to the center for our clients.  She was very nice & I then recognized her as the lady that took care of me when I was applying for my Healthy New York, after I lost my job back in January of 2009, after our company had closed.  She was very nice & I was glad to see her again. She was very helpful to me & she left us many brochures for our future clients.  She new Anne, the President from 'Rochester Right to Life'.  Small world. 

I went outside for a few minutes & I was stopped by a man who was delivering something at the Veterinary Hospital, which is across the street from Planned Parenthood.  He walked over to me & said that he was a Knight, from St. Jude's Parish.  I quickly went to give him one of our brochures & asked him for donations for our center's work.  He said that he would look into it.  He's name was Phil & he asked if I would make up a sign that will read :

'Why is America committing Genocide against it's own people with more than 55 million babies killed since 1973'?? 

Good question Phil, what's wrong with America for allowing this Genocide to take place??  What agenda, is America supporting, as they betray Almighty God??  We should be better than this!!

Martha, John, Carole & Maria & I were outside to witness & to counsel taking all the abuse that comes to us by the people driving & walking by us & those who are at Planned Parenthood.  That's a part of the ministry.  You learn to live with it.  We do it to try to save & to change lives through the grace of God. 

Martha & I went into the center to do some work there & Tucker came into the center, to get his sign & then to go outside to witness until 6pm. Well this afternoon he stayed & talked to Martha & I for about an half an hour.  He was about to leave when one of the drivers from the Taxi company came over to us in the All Purpose Room asking if he could use a chair of ours.  I said "yes" thinking that he was setting up for a meeting when all of a sudden he placed the chair on the floor & stood on it & then preceded to rip the Taxi's antenna right out of the ceiling & he ran outside with it in his hands.  We were all in shock & I then knocked on the door of the Taxi company & said to Alan that one of the drivers just came in & ripped the antenna right out of the ceiling.  He said "what"!  Then he said that he was going to call the bosses right away, which he did, because when I went to the outside door I saw that they were out there, in the parking lot, & the driver who had just stolen the antenna was arguing with them.  Unfortunately a little while later they had brought him back into the building & that's when the troubles just got started with me.  One of the bosses had asked me what had happened when the guy was right next to him.  I started to tell him what has just happened when the 'bad guy' said to me "mind your own business" with an evil eye pointed right to me.  I said back that it was my business because this was our pregnancy center  here to.  Then he said "mind your own business or I'll stab you". "What" I said, "what did you just say to me"?   Well, the first rule is that if anyone threatens our life then we must call the police to report it, for we won't have anyone threaten us, for no one has that right to put us in jeopardy. 

Then my second hell began, the police came.  You would think that they would be on my side, since I called them regarding the threat that was made to me but remember that we live in an imperfect world.  They  wounded me a second time with their not understanding of what had just taken place & their unbelief of what he had said to me.  The one police officer made some really strange comments that were unbelievable & quite inappropriate, to say the least.  I thought that I was in the 'Twilight Zone' (for those of you that know what I'm talking about)!!   It was the second nightmare of the day.  Martha went around sprinkling some Holy Salt around the rooms, for what was happening was demonic, to say the least.  Martha spoke to the one police officer to set him straight & I was left with the other, poor me.  Well I got no where fast & they finally left.  I decided not to make a citizens arrest for Martha didn't have in her hearing aid so she didn't hear him say that to me.  That was far, if she didn't then she didn't but I did.  So it was his word against my word, & that's that.  He latter apologized for what he said to me with the prompting of Martha who said that we should all just get along.  Blessed are the peace makers.  So he started to approach me & I backed off & accepted his apology from a far.  That'll do.  To say the least it was a very stressful time that was most unexpected, in the center. 

It was 6pm & the landlord came in, saying to me "I heard that you called the police".  I answered back to him "so you have a police radio Bernie".  No answer.  We had an appointment with the man, from Christian Rugs tonight, to pick out the color for the new rug in the new Great Room.  This turned out not as exciting as it should have because of all the commotion earlier on.  Needless to say I picked out a nice multi colored rug & the landlord worked out a payment plan.  It will be put in next Tuesday at 12 noon, just in time for our special Wednesday Mass, in the new Great Room, to celebrate the Blessed Mother's Birthday & the Focus Pregnancy Help Center's 5 years of service, in helping pregnant moms & their families, in the community.  Should be a great evening, can't wait!

Martha had to go, the stress was to much for her & I was left straightening out the center until it was done.  That's the job of the Director & that's fine with me.  Later on she told me that she had gone to church, to pray to God, before the Blessed Sacrament.  What a stressful day but a day of blessings too.  God always turns things around & makes it for good.  I just need to trust Him more, for He is forever faithful.    

 

Thursday, September 2, 2010 in front of Planned Parenthood

Outside on the sidewalk we had Martha, Bill, John, I & two other pro lifers, who were praying on the other side of the building, of Planned Parenthood today with Rose & Deanna inside the center.  Carole came by, which was a surprise because she doesn't usually come on Thursdays, but to our shock she said that her little grand daughter Payton, who was born 4 weeks ago at 1lb. 7ozs., was dying.  I gave her a hug & said that we are holding little Payton in our hearts & prayers.  This was a sad moment.  She told us that if she's not here next week she'll  be in Ohio where her daughter & Son in Law are.  Let's pray for a miracle dear Lord to let baby Payton to live & please bless the family with peace.  Thank you Lord Jesus. A few minutes later the cars began to go into Planned Parenthood to have their precious children be killed by the abortionist Rachael Phelps.  One baby is born & is trying to survive & the other babies are not born yet & are trying to survive.  Why are some mothers killing their own children, rather then loving & protecting them, like Carole's daughter is?  This scenario is really strange. 

I just then got a call & it was a client of ours needing some diapers & wipes & clothes for her baby.  I told her to come on in & we'll give her some.  Later after she arrived she told me that her grandmother had taken her baby & all his clothes, without her permission, when she was in her parents house, where she is now living.  She called the police & they told her to get an order of protection out on the grandmother & to press Kidnapping charges against her.  She & her mother got her son back the next day after the grandmother dropped the baby off at Day Care.  What was she thinking?  I gave her a bag of diapers & a box of wipes & she picked out some baby clothes, to hold her off, until she could get the clothes back from the grandmother.  She wasn't sure how that would happen.  So the Focus Center was there for her during this difficult time & I was glad of that.  I gave her some special personal items like a basket full of soaps, candles & lotions for herself that made her very happy.  My heart melted when she gave me a big smile back & a hug with a 'thank you' besides.  "My pleasure" I said back.  She, like all our clients & their children, are so dear to our hearts & are in our prayers too.  Off she & her precious baby were off to catch the bus downtown.  Keep in touch I said to her as she was leaving.  She turned around & said that she would.  That made me very happy.

I was now back to the front lines & the pro lifers there were praying & sidewalk counseling.  A few minutes later Deanna arrived to work in the center.  I followed her into the center & then gave her some instructions.  I needed some letters to be written & some other small projects for her to do.  I was sad because this was her last day with us for she's going back to England to do her mission work there.  We'll all miss her that's for sure & she's been such a blessing to us over the past 4 weeks that she's been with us.   The very best to dear Deanna.  She said that she'll be back in the US at Christmas time & we'll see her then again :) 
 

When I went back outside I brought some bottled water from the refrig, for it was a very hot day.  The team was glad to see me that's for sure.  Just then the cars were coming out of Planned Parenthood & the girls had there heads down & the boyfriends were shouting at us.  They had their precious baby be killed here today & now are tormented by our graphic signs, that was suppose to save their baby's life, but they wouldn't listen & they went through with it, paying the assassin to kill their God given child.  How Evil, how Inhumane & how Insane.  My heart drops when they come out of Planned Parenthood & of course when they go in too.  Lives, through the grace of God, have been saved but many lives have been lost, which is so difficult for  Martha & I especially because we are usually the ones that are there when they come out 'looking like death warmed over' slumped either in the fron or back seat of the car, the rest of the team are usually gone at that time.  Maybe we should be gone too, for it's so hard for Martha & I?   We only hope & pray that they will ask God to forgive them for this sin of 'murder' (which abortion is) with a sincere heart of repentance & God will forgive them, otherwise they are putting their souls in jeopardy, of going to Hell forever, for this Mortal Sin. 

The doorbell rang & I went to open the door.  I saw three young girls, standing there.  I asked if I could help them & two of the girls said that they were here for a pregnancy test, the third girl was pregnant.  I lead them to the Rose Room for testing & counseling.  I asked the two girls to fill out an Intake Sheet.  The one girl said "is this Planned Parenthood"?  I looked at her in surprise & said "no it's not, they kill babies at Planned Parenthood, we're a pregnancy center where we save lives".  The first test was done - negative, the second test was done - negative.  I started to teach about self respect & abstinence.  These girls were very young but not as young as the pregnant little girl for she was 14 years old.  It made me very upset that a boy took advantage of her at 14.  Where was the mother who works in the church??  Don't get me wrong I'm so glad that she's having her baby & not killing her child, that's not the point. That's a given, for when you're pregnant, you stay that way, no matter what your situation is  'YOU NEVER KILL YOUR BABY'!!  The questions are: why do these girls have no boundaries & why don't they know how to say "NO" & why are they getting themselves in these situations, with these inconsiderate, sex minded guys, that are using them for their pleasure.  I want to make the bad things that happen to them go away but I can't.  That's why prayer & education is so important along with our love & guidance, that we give them at the Focus Center, is so important, for a 'new beginning'.  Where are their mothers & fathers??  Where are the Preachers & Teachers, in the Community??  They all seem to know where Planned Parenthood is!!  That EVIL place that kills babies & ruins peoples lives.  What is wrong with this picture?  When I found out that she was 14 I asked her to fill out an Intake Sheet so that Suzanne can call her, at times, to see how she is doing & if she needs anything.  I also gave her some helpful brochures to take with her & told her to call them to get some assistance during her pregnancy & afterwards.  We'll be there for her too.  I also gave her the Growth & Development DVD & the movie Bella (which is about adoption) & some adoption informational brochures too.  I gave her some baby T shirts & a baby blanket & said for  her to come back when she knows if she's going to have a boy or a girl.  She was happy to hear that.  She seemed in 'good spirits' with her pregnancy & that's good because emotions effect the baby, in the womb.  All three girls said thank you & good bye & off they went, into the cruel world.  I was thinking that her two friends, probably want to get pregnant to, so that all three are pregnant at the same time, for they are best friends.  Like I said earlier, where are the parents, etc.?  Doesn't anyone care?  We do, we're a start.........
 
Pastor Jane't had just arrived, for her teaching course, about the Bible.  I didn't get there until late & Martha had gone to get a pizza for our supper.  We all ate at the table & Jane't played some beautiful music to relax us.  I had just finished the cream of broccoli pizza when the doorbell rang & it was Jennifer, from the Catholic Courier, for an interview that she called me about the day before.  She was doing an article about how some people got started in their ministries & what makes them keep on going after all these years later & through difficult times.  It's an easy couple of questions to answer for it's  'God'.   He chose me for this ministry & keeps me going forward.  I interviewed with her for two hours & fifteen minutes.  I got a little long winded talking about myself but I did give 'God the Glory' as I witnessed to her highlights of my 25 years in the pro life movement, on the streets & in the center.  She had to go, to pack her suitcase, for her & her husband were heading to Rome the next day to see the Pope & to take a journalism class.  I asked her if I could fit in her suitcase.  She laughed, maybe she thought I was kidding?  Have a safe & blessed trip Jennifer.  The article will be in the October's Catholic Courier. 
 
It was 8:15pm now & Martha & Jane't had gone home.
