John was in the center working on getting the paperwork up to date.  I had made him, a sandwich & he enjoyed it.  He is a blessing to the Focus Center.  I met a woman who said that she worked for the Planned Parenthood in Ethiopia & was deceived to learn that Planned Parenthood kills little babies in their mothers wombs.  She was so sorrowful & has repented.  I felt so badly for her for she was in such pain for what she did in her past.  She can make it up for what she does in the present. 
 
I went out to be with the team on the front lines.  We witnessed to the public & then all of a sudden there were two young guys who planted themselves across the street with make shift signs.  I was hard on them that's for sure.  They turned out to be two mixed up guys & it was a painful experience for me.  They are non practicing Catholics & were so mixed up about so many things & their Faith.  I had said to them "you're mothers are pro life".  And the one young man said "my mother is pro choice".  I then said then you have some brothers or sisters in Heaven.  This statement upset him & he called his mother on his cell phone.  She said that it was between her & her God.  The other guy mentioned that yellow was blue if he wanted it to be. He was treating God as a magician, it was soooo sad & disturbing that's for sure.  The Death Escort, Barry Swan was leaning the Planned Parenthood where he commits sin & he made a turn & came to approach the two naive boys were protesting but didn't really know what they were doing.  I was trying to cross the street to approach the situation when the Death Escort left.  The poor guys said  that the baby in the womb wasn't a baby, then what was it??  I told then that the baby's heart is beating at 18 to 21 days, after conception, in the womb & that they were once in the womb & they're human.  How do you explain that??  They were so messed up & it was so sad. I heard them talking that they were planning to have more people come to join them next time.  I said "bring them on", the more the better because hopefully someone will be converted that the Lord will use us to help someone.  Then they question God, I said that if you don't believe in God then ask him to relieve himself to you.  The one guy called his mother again asking her more questions.  They said that they were 'free thinkers', how dangerous.  I said that you need guidance to direct you for you will go astray, which you are doing.  I asked them if they were going to Mass every Sunday & they said "no".  I said that not going to Mass on Sundays is a mortal sin & if you died right now you will go to Hell because you know that to be true.  It is a mortal sin which dams your soul to Hell so be sorry for your sins & go to Confession to be absolved. 
 
 
Wednesday, November 3, 2010 in front of Planned Parenthood
 
The abortionist Planned Parenthood Rachel Phelps was giving a talk in Syracuse, NY & this was what was reported back to me.
 
The protest went well.  There were only about 20 of us but we marched up and down the sidewalk and at one point said the Rosary together.  We never saw Dr. Phelps but we made our presence known to those who went to the talk and when they exited after 8 PM.  Off and on a car would drive by honking its horn in favor of us.  However, one woman whom we assume attended the meeting told us she adopted children but did believe in abortion, adding that she works in a poor school and sees the bad side of what children go through and should not have to.  That was the basis for her belief.  She told us to adopt children so they can be spared miserable, unproductive lives but no one will because they're black.  One of our protesters, a mother of 7, said she would adopt.
 
Later, a young college-age looking woman who attended the talk approached us and in a friendly manner said she understood our protest but she believed in a woman's right to govern her own body.  She said Dr. Phelps spoke on teen pregnancy and the effect of our culture on sexuality through the media, etc.  Several of us tried to talk to her but she was quite glib although not verbally combative.  One of the protesters loudly kept saying things to her, such as babies being killed, etc. and it was difficult for us to listen to her while he was talking.  I told him to let her finish.  She thanked me for that.  It probably could have could have been a productive discussion with her, in my opinion, but the guy who was bizarre prevented that.  At one point she said she was a Christian and I countered with killing isn't Christian or to that effect. 
 
Another incident took place when a car with teenagers (that's my guess) stopped their car and a girl said, and I'm paraphrasing, "It's my body" and other statements and ended with, as they drove away, "FU!" and gave us the finger.  I said to our group to pray for her.  She may have  had an abortion or is living a disastrous life.
 
I did contact two TV news stations and the newspaper but none of them approached us.  One TV station told me they were going to cover Dr. Phelps' talk.
  
This is a short synopsis of the article in the 'Good Health' newsaper (a very liberal, biased newspaper), November 2010. 
 
Phelps, (the abortionist) in Rochester, is the Associate Medical Director at Planned Parenthood who has served on expert advisory committee for the National Campaign to prevent teen & unplanned pregnancy & the Association of Reproductive Health Professionals.  (Are you kidding to think that abortion is healthy for mother & child).  She has lectured nationally for the National Abortion (baby killing) Federation, & the Medical Students for Choice. (Some doctors they will turn out to be, I thought that a doctor was suppose to save lives, not take lives, how stupid of me).  She completed a Residency in Pediatrics (poor kids) at the University of Rochester, (a killing hospital).  She was in the New York Times article "We Can Do Better', (we sure can by NOT KILLING OUR CHILDREN DR. PHELPS) published July 18,2010. 
http://www.nytimes.com/2010/07/18/magazine/18abortion-t.html?pagewanted=all. Phelps is on the left side. These are two very confused women. 
 
 
 
It was good that Phelps wasn't at Planned Parenthood today, for she was in Syracuse (poor Syracuse) so Martha & I mostly stayed in the center to put things away in the Material Aid Room.  We are being blessed with so many things. We went outside at times to talk to the people going in & out of Planned Parenthood.  They are victims of the lies & deception of Planned Parenthood.  I pray that people will wake up from their sleep.  I was outside at the time that our three sweet Elim students came to help us out in the center.  Poor girls, for I kept them sooo busy doing so much work.  They don't complain but keep on going.  They got to help out some moms to get some nice things in the Material Aid Room, which they enjoyed.  They like to talk with the moms & to see their babies.  Then I asked for them to clean the car seats that we were given & to put away boxes of baby & children clothes.  They made up more Truth packets for us to hand out on the front lines.  Elizabeth wrote a Thank You letter for a nice woman that blessed us with a donation.  So much to do.  Martha had to leave around 5pm tonight. Alicia came to drop off more children's clothes & I said "good bye" to the students at 6:30pm & thanked them for all the hard work that they did in the center tonight.  Such great helpers. Tucker came earlier & went out to the front lines & prayed by himself outside.  Poor Alicia, I was so wound up that I told her my life story, poor girl.  I think I shocked her but she listened to my tale of woe.  She gave me a big hug & I know that she felt for me.  She is so sweet.  I ate by myself around 9pm, for I was so busy, which was good.  I went home around 10:30pm.  So much to do at a pregnancy center.  Glad that I'm not married.... poor husband, I'd never be home to see him.  The single life is very fulfilling & rewarding.  Thank God for good friends & my cat Godfree. 
 
 
Thursday, November 4, 2010 in front of Planned Parenthood
 
I stayed in the center while Martha went outside to be on the front lines.  Bill was across the street so I felt like I could stay in the center to do some things before going outside.  Suzanne was coming at 1:30pm so then I could be out there with Martha.  When Suzanne arrived I shared some things with her then went outside.  Martha told me that a car with a white woman & an African American young girl had pulled out of the parking lot & the girl was slumped down in the front seat.  Phelps had already murdered little babies earlier this morning & will continue until she goes home later this day.  A young girl had come out of Planned Parenthood & all I said to her was that they kill babies in there & that we could help her.  She told to shut up & walked away down the street & called to her as she walked about a couple of other this that she probably didn't know about.  You just keep on trying to tell the Truth & hope & pray that people will change, through the grace of God. 
 
Two girls went into Planned Parenthood & I said that we could help them & the one girl said "thank you" & walked right into that evil place.  When they both came out the girl that said "thank you" earlier started be nasty.  "I'm pro choice" she hollered.  I said "you mean you're pro death or pro abortion", then I said "what choice did your son or daughter have"?  I hope that made her think.  It's not an 'it', he or she is a person who wants be born & not aborted. 
 
There were other people that were receptive today, which is good.  Suzanne did a pregnancy test & gave out some baby & children clothes from the Material Aid Room.  We gave away a beautiful white crib to one of our moms & she was so happy.
 
Martha & I ate early tonight for we had to pick up Christine to take her to Hilton to a second hand store to pick up some things for her new studio apartment that she just moved into.  She so happy now since she is out of the shelter & into her own place.  We glad to help her to get things for it.  It was a rainy 7 cold evening but all went well.  John came by later on to help us get all Christine's things in her apartment.  Thanks Martha & John.  A job well done & Christine was very happy to say the least.  She got so many nice things at the store. 
 
 
 
Wednesday, November 10, 2010 in front of Planned Parenthood
 
Martha, Carole & I were there on the front lines & at the center in the afternoon.  The rudeness of people still amaze me.  How do they live with themselves??  Only God knows.  I went in & out on the sidewalk but stayed mostly in the center doing work in there.  We gave a way lots of baby & children clothes to our needy moms for their many children.  I was glad that the three wonderful Elim Bible Students came at 4pm to help us get the Mass ready to celebrate at 6pm.  I kept them very busy setting up tables & chairs for the last Mass of the year.  Tucker came to the sidewalk to witness at 4pm & stayed until 6pm.  Thanks Tucker.  People started to come in around 5:45pm & Father arrived around the same time.  I asked if he had brought his Mass Kit & he said "no, he thought that we had a kit at the center, which we don't.  So we had an old church Mass with Monk's bread that we had in the refrig & I went over to the Ethiopian restaurant to get a glass of wine for the Mass.  It was a beautiful Mass & before Father started he heard my Confession & after the Mass he gave me the Sacrament of the Sick.  Thank you Fr. Joe & God bless you.  He was so nice to eat with my many friends who came to celebrate in the Holy Mass & afterwards with such great food.  Martha made her famous chili mmmm good.  We had pasta with sausage & many great deserts.  It was a wonderful evening.
 

Thursday, November 11, 2010 in front of Planned Parenthood

It was a busy afternoon & I was glad that Suzanne was in the center counseling & helping out in the Material Aid Room.  I was in & out all afternoon & felt like I had abandoned Martha who was out on the front lines.  She understood though. 
 
I almost stayed in denial that the abortionist, Rachael Phelps wasn't killing any precious babies but I was wrong.  I had just come out onto the front lines when I saw a car drive out of the driveway & the woman passenger looked like death warmed over.  I knew that her baby was killed in Planned Parenthood without mercy & for money.  How evil! 
 
I got to speak to some of the girls & Suzanne had helped some moms receive some 'free' clothes for their children in the center.  We must stay positive for the moms who did 'chose life' for their children.  This is a very difficult ministry.  My heart aches all the time with the slaughter of the unborn & the destruction of their mothers.  Abortion effects everyone, even if you don't think so!!
 
Martha & I took our client & friend out for lunch on her birthday at Applebee's, on Sunday, to celebrate her 23rd. birthday.  Her baby is 13 weeks old, in the womb, now.  Praise God for her & her 'saved' baby from the RU 486 abortion pills!!
 
 
Tuesday, November 16, 2010 in front of Planned Parenthood
 
Martha called me at home to tell me that she'd wouldn't be at the 12:10 Mass downtown for she was going to have lunch with a friend & she had already went to Mass earlier this morning, so she said that she would see me at 1pm at the center.  I said "okay & thanks for letting me know this & I'll see you at 1.  After Mass downtown I went to the center & I noticed that Martha's car was parked on the street where she always parks the car, in front of Buckpitt, a business next to Planned Parenthood.  They do NOTHING!  I went into the center & said to her "why are you here so early Martha" for it was 12:40pm?  She said that she was seeing a client & would talk to me later.  I said "okay" & went about emptying out my car with bags of food for our lunch & supper.  Then all of a sudden the man at the taxi company, which has an office in the building where we have the center, told me that a police officer was writing out a ticket out for Martha's car.  I rushed outside to my car & got my purse & walked over to the police car & said "officer I'm putting the money in the meter right now".  He said "no problem".  I put 4 quarters in the meter & thanked the officer & God for not giving Martha a $35 parking ticket.  Close call.  Later I told Martha & she thanked me.  I was happy that the taxi man had told me of the situation & that I had the quarters & the police officer was nice.  Thanks Lord!!
 
I went to the Material Aid Room to get the literature box & the graphic sign & went to my post on the front lines.  I was there for about 10 minutes by myself  when Carole came, I was so glad.  A few minutes later Donna arrived. 
 
 
Martha was in the Rose Room counseling our client who was with her friend, assisting with a pregnancy test.  The one girl is a rape survivor & conceived in that rape & she bore a son who is 3 years old now.  Never did she think to abort this little child.  She is pregnant again from a consensual relationship & will not abort this little child either, even if the father wants her, she will not do it. We always speak about abstinence with our clients. no sex outside of marriage.  If this was abided to, the world would be a better & healthier place, to live in. 
 
Another young girl came into the Rose Room for a pregnancy test with her girlfriend & she was negative but cried when Martha asked her if she had ever been pregnant before, for she had had an abortion in the past & was regretting it.  She started to cry.  Her girlfriend told her to stop crying & Martha told her that it was healing & that she needed to grieve for what she did.  Martha gave her the post abortion brochures to take with her, to get forgiveness from God & healing.  What's with her girlfriend??  Maybe she was post abortive too??

School bus driver stopped to talk to me.  There was no children on the bus.  She told me that her niece had had an abortion at 6 months.  She told her that she would adopt the baby but she went ahead & did it.  She got pregnant soon after her abortion & kept the baby.  Lots of women try to get pregnant after their abortion due to the fact that feel such a loss.  I gave her post abortion information to give to her for forgiveness & healing & also a Truth packet & A DVD on Growth & Development & Maafa 21 & the 12 week old rubberized baby.  She gave me her name & I gave her mine.  She said "thank you' & off she went down the street.  This was a blessing for not to many buses have stopped, to talk to us, over the years.  I think only on 4 occasions, in the past 14 years, that we've been out there praying & protesting. 

It was raining & very windy.  It's always harder when we get all wet & icky.  I need to get a good hat & waterproof gloves & put my boots on too.  I usually bring a change of clothes with me, on the days that I'm out on the front lines, just in case of a change of weather.  The signs blow away & one did & hit the Planned Parenthood sign that out in the front of their killing clinic.  It didn't break it for they just put up a new sign to advertise who they are.  Ick!!

Martha ripped her coat. I felt so badly for Martha for she just got a new jacket & it was waterproof & had a hood on it too. Donna was putting her tables that she had let us use into her car when she pinched her finger.  Ouch!!  What pain she had.  It hurt so badly that she had to go in the Great Room for a few minutes to sit down on the sofa to recoup.  Carole brought a client home, that didn't have a ride for it was raining hard & Martha brought Sandy, who helps out in the center on Tuesdays, home too. 
 
We gave away lots of children's clothes & we were happy that most of the moms had cars, to bring the items home.  There were some very nasty people who drove by showing us their IQ (the bird).  If only they would stop to talk to us & get the help that they need from their abortions.  They're angry at us because we show them what they did in secret, which it never is.  "All that is done in darkness will be exposed to the light", the Bible says. 

A man & his wife or his girlfriend went into Planned Parenthood with a baby, it was so sad to see this scenario.  This bothers me so much to see someone bringing a baby or children into this cess pool where they murder little babies.  This is an evil place & no one should enter it's door that lead to no where.     

Carole, our prayer warrior who is out on the front lines twice a week, her little granddaughter Peyton is in stable though critical condition.  She is back on the respirator.  She has had many surgeries & the last surgery on her eyes took its toll on her.  She was born 1lb. 6ozs. about 4 months ago.  Please pray for her & for her family. 
 
The death escort, at Planned Parenthood, was butting in when I was talking to the people, that came over to us on the sidewalk, to speak to us & I told her to mind her own business.  Later on she left & walked down the street & she came back about an hour later & she took her cat to the vets across the street.  I guess cats are more important than the children, that are being slaughtered across the street at Planned Parenthood, where she was there helping them to be killed.  How confused can you be!!!!
 
A young man was sitting on the bench in front of Planned Parenthood & I invited him over to speak to us.  He laughed & came over to challenge us he thought.  He looked so typically to who we usually talk to. He had a smirk on his face & had a attitude that he was right & we were wrong.  He was very confused & I mean that with love.  The first thing that he said was "God is pro choice".  "What" I said.  What are you saying?  God is pro life & He condemns abortion. Then he said to me was "what religion are you"?  I said "I'm Catholic".  He then said "you need to give that up".  I replied back to him "I'll never give up the one true Church, never".  Then he said to me "I'm a Catholic too".  "What" I said "please come back to the Church".  He then went on to say that it's the right of the woman to have an abortion & that it was her body & if she gets pregnant after a rape she should have an abortion if she wanted one".  I told him that the Bible, which is the Word of God,  "Thou shall not murder".  He said that he knew someone who was raped & had the baby & killed herself because the baby reminded her of the rapist.  I said that I was sorry to hear this but abortion would still have been wrong.  Maybe she needed counseling & supervision & maybe could have placed her baby up for adoption & maybe she suffered from postpartum depression, which is common in all moms, not just those moms who were raped.  I told him of my sister who was raped & she gave birth to her daughter & didn't commit suicide.  I was so sad to hear this story but abortion would not have been the answer.  Women who have abortions have also committed suicide.  Donna spoke with him for a little while too.  He left because he wasn't getting to far with us, with his thinking.  He went back into Planned Parenthood. I didn't see him until hours later when he drove out of the parking lot with his girlfriend.  I hollered over to him to go to Confession for the Lord was waiting for him & then he could receive the true Body, Blood & Divinity of Jesus.  I also said "hope that you didn't have your baby killed here today".  Off he went & the girlfriend who was in the front seat hide her face.  God only knows what they did in there.  Lord have Mercy.  He was so mixed up & my heart sank. So many Catholics are so confused these days.  I will pray for them all to come back to the Church who loves them & will guide them to Heaven. 
 
After the young man went back into Planned Parenthood the two females, who were sitting on the bench with this young man who we just spoke with, came over to us on the sidewalk.  I offered them help & asked if they were pregnant.  The girl to my right said that she was.  I felt sick for I new what was coming next.  I said "you're not thinking of having an abortion"?  "Oh yes I am" she replied.  I had a feeling she was going to say this.  Then the other woman said "I'm her mother & I don't want to raise a child".  Lord have Mercy in what I'm hearing.  Then Donna started to talk to them & I went over to the literature box to get the 12 week old rubberized baby to give to them & also the DVD on Growth & Development & Maafa 21: Black Genocide in the 21st. Century, which the mother took.  We spoke to them for a few more minutes & then the mother said that she had to use the bathroom.  Donna offered her our center & she said that she was going back into Planned Parenthood to talk to them.  Why would you talk to people that are willing to kill children?  Then Donna said to them "please watch the DVD before you do anything".  The mother said "okay".  I had also mentioned to them that the baby's heart begins to beat at 18-21 days after conception.  Then the young girl looked at the rubberized baby & said that she thought that the baby gets hands & feet at 2 months.  No I said that comes earlier that 2 months.  Prayer & education are the keys.  They went back into Planned Parenthood & I only hope & pray that the mother took the daughter home to watch the DVD & not have had her grandchild killed today.   


 Wednesday, November 17, 2010 in front of Planned Parenthood 

It was another rainy, dark, cold, windy day on the front lines.  We get though it through God's help.  I had a hood on today.  The signs blow away & we have to bend down all the time to pick them up which is fine.  We want to witness to everyone who walks by & drives by & goes into Planned Parenthood.  We want to be used by God to save lives. 

I was in the center & when I came back outside Martha & Carole told me about a white man pulling a black girl into Planned Parenthood. Martha told him to stop.  I used the mega phone to call out to her to tell her that we can help her & if she comes out to us we will protect her.  We will even call the police if she wanted us to.  She never came out but he did. He came over to the sidewalk in front of Planned Parenthood, to smoke.  I call over to him & gave him a piece of my mind, I didn't use bad words or swear, but I spoke to him with sternness of what he did to her.  After he finished his smoke he turned around & looked at me with his beady eyes & walked back into Planned Parenthood.  I never saw him or her come out & either did Tucker, for he comes on the front lines from 4-6pm.  Maybe someone came & picked them up.  Poor baby!!  I hope & pray that she can get away from that man.

A volunteer from the Women's Care Center Pregnancy Center, in Charlotte, came & got 5 pregnancy tests for their center. Their order won't come in until Monday & they don't want to be without, I can't blame them. They bless us when we need baby clothes for our material aid room.  It's nice that the pregnancy centers can help each other.  We are a 'team'. 

Mary, from the St. John's Religious Shop in Spencerport, 
dropped off the pamphlets of 'How to Say the Rosary'.  We  put the pamphlets in an individual bag with the rosary.  Our friend Bob George, made for our ministry, 150 rosaries for our 'hand out' ministry, for the people on the street & to put in the Truth packets, to teach people how to say the rosary, so they can get closer to God through Mother Mary.  Thanks Bob.  :)

Christine , our client & friend, called & said that she was going to stop by the center after she went to RG&E to turn on her gas.  The weather was so bad that she took the bus home.  Don't blame her.

Martha gave a pregnancy test to a young girl that was going to PP but came to our center with her girlfriend & her boyfriend.  Martha brought them into the Rose Room & the girl was sitting on her boyfriend's lap & Martha said to her "here's a chair", pointing to an empty chair in the room.  She got up & went over & sat down on it.  The girl said that she heard us outside of Planned Parenthood, a couple of weeks ago, when her friend was at Planed Parenthood having an abortion but she wanted to support her friend, so she didn't come out.  Gage!!  So they are now BOTH post abortive.  It will effect them for the rest of their lives.  Lord have Mercy!

A young woman came from behind the bushes & told me that she didn't believe in abortion & wanted to know where to go for exams.  I gave her our Truth packet & the doctors list.  She thanked me & said that if she was pregnant she wouldn't do that to her baby, pointing to our graphic sign. She told us to keep up the great work that we are doing.  Don't worry, we will.  I told her that she was a good woman, one with a heart.  She smiled & walked away.

An older Africian American woman came into the parking lot & stopped her car & said that she didn't believe in abortion & that she was picking up he granddaughter for she was there for birth control. We told her about the effects of birth control & gave her a Truth packet, with lots of information in it & a teaching DVD to educate her & her family.  She said "thank you" & drove in to pick up her granddaughter. 

A nasty guy drove by me, on the sidewalk, showing me his IQ (the bird) & I told him to repent.  Where are the real men???

A guy, coming out of Planned Parenthood, walked across the street hollered over to me "got condoms".  I hollered back to him "got Jesus"?  "Please repent for you are on the wrong road, sex is not worth going to hell for", I said back to him.  How sad to think that you can do want you want to without consequences.   

Sheila, our new recruit on the front lines, was with us this afternoon for an hour & she gave away a Truth packet & even went across the street to give one away to a woman, who just had come out of Planned Parenthood.  She even spent some time talking with her.  She's being Pro Active!!!  Yeah! 
 
A white car has been there at Planned Parenthood parking in the abortionist parking spot. Perhaps a  new abortionist???  Or a new car of the current abortionist Rachael Phelps.  Where do these people come from & what makes them tick?  How did they get so sick in the head??  Lord we pray for their conversions.

A car stopped with 3 women in it.  The mother who was the driver asked for a packet with a rosary in it.  I gave her a Truth packet & then the one daughter asked for one then the other daughter asked for one.  They all received a Truth packet.  I said to the mom that she was a good mom in educating her daughter & that she was a breath of fresh air & I thanked her for doing the right thing.  She smiled & they drove off. 

I had to go into the center for a few minutes & Martha was already there doing a pregnancy test so I gave on of the signs to Carole & left to go to the center to put on another sweater for it was cold & windy out there today.  When I returned Carole told me that our sign blew away & hit the PP
sign which is right in front of their building.  It didn't break but if it did it wasn't our fault.

Paula came to help out at the center with 6 of her 7 children.  She & her husband has 3 biological children & 4 adopted children.  She & her older daughter Hannah are a blessing to us.  The both organized the office & made up Truth packets. I kept them very busy. What a blessing they are.
 
A client of ours came in to get some things for her baby girl, she's ready to deliver in a few weeks.  She got some nice things & Paula will try to get her a double stroller for this baby & her 2 year old son.  She is still at the shelter but will move into her new apartment on Friday.  It was good seeing her & we will continue to assist her.

Tucker came in to get his favorite sign of the 3 babies, to go outside to witness, on the front lines. 

Valerie, our client, called & then came into the material aid room, to get some things for her family, she's expecting twins next year.  She lost her job & needs a new apartment for her family.  We gave her many nice things & Martha drove her home.

The 3 Elim Students came in at 4pm & worked doing lots of things at the center.  They said that they were thankful that God had brought them to Focus & so am I.  They folded brochures & made up signs & more Truth packets.   They helped our clients in the material aid room too, which they like to do. What a blessing they are to me.  Thank you Lord :)

Martha & I had a fast supper of thin pork chops with spaghetti & a side dish of peas.  No desert tonight & then we raced over to St. Thomas More Church to attend the Charismatic Mass at 7:30pm.  What a blessing it was. 

 
Thursday, November 18, 2010 in front of Planned Parenthood
 
Please Boycott Ted Hosmer for they do Landscaping for Planned Parenthood who kills babies.  Write, call or email them at: 

Ted Hosmer Enterprises Inc

585-334-3620
1249 Lehigh Station Rd Henrietta, NY 14467
tedhosmer.com
 
Four men were out in front of Planned Parenthood doing work on their property.  I spoke to them & I was very upset when I did.  They saw the graphic pictures & one turned his head away & the other did give me a thumbs up but their boss who is in bed with Planned Parenthood needs to be contacted about receiving Blood Money from Planned Parenthood who murders little babies in Cold Blood for $$$.  Make your voice heard by contacting them & asking them to stop doing work at Planned Parenthood now!!  Thank you & God bless.

Great news that I want to share with you.  Suzanne, our counselor on Thursdays, calls our clients to see how they are doing & if they need anything.  Well today she found out that 2 more precious babies, that were saved from abortion, were born. The first baby was born on 11-5-10 & her name is Innocent a little girl 4lb. 11oz. mother & baby are doing well for she came a little early.  Second baby girl Anyiah was born on 11-10-10 weighing 6lbs. 11oz.  Mother & baby are also doing well. Mom needs a bassinet.  We always need baby girl & boy clothes for our moms for their children.  Thank you for all that you do for Focus in prayer & support.  We have two more babies that are are due in December & more in January to April 2011, Praise God. I'll let you know when they are born :) 

 
Tuesday, November 23, 2010 in front of Planned Parenthood
 
Carole had called me at home to tell me that she & her husband was sick with the flu & couldn't make it today.  Sorry to hear this Carole ... we wish you & your hubby well soon.  I hurried to the center after Mass, always in a hurry.  My car was full with boxes of children's clothes, a baby walker & a large microwave that Maria gave me to give to who needs it the most.  It turned out to be one of the taxi drivers, for his wife's friend who just had a baby & her husband is serving in another country, so she's alone without much.  We at Focus gave her some blankets for her baby girl, a bassinet & a baby swing but she needs more things, we're working on it.  So many of our clients need so much I wish that I could service them more quickly.  I do appreciate all the wonderful people that the Lord brings to us that blesses us with pac'n plays, baby & children clothes, walkers, car seats, strollers etc..  We couldn't run our pregnancy center without them :)   Sandy, who helps us out on Tuesdays had just arrived to help get the boxes out of the car.  Martha was making coffee, for she was tired & needed a boost before going out to the front lines.  Donna was already out there praying & holding her sign which read 'CHOOSE LIFE...THERE'S HOPE'.  John was with us today but I wanted him to stay in the center to do some office work, like writing thank you letters to the churches that have recently blessed us with a large tithing contribution for the work of the Focus Center.  Also to make a sign for the outside that tells people driving by that we have 'free' baby & children's clothes.  He did some other creative projects too.  He did help to bring some signs out to the sidewalk but just a few for it was sooo windy today.  Martha was now out on the sidewalk, & I always feel better when she is, for she calls out to the girls & talks to them using the megaphone.  They need to hear the Truth in order for their hearts to be touched & to turn away from Planned Parenthood.  We offer them options like good doctors & good people that can help them in their situation.  We hand out the Truth packet, where they get a great amount of information, by the brochures that we have in the bag & phone numbers too.  I always feel good when they take that packet. 
 
After all the instructions that I gave John, whom I'm very grateful for, I went out with a sign to the sidewalk to join the team.  Mary S. had arrived & then the lady with the white dog.  Don't get me wrong I'm not blaming the dog.  This lady  drove into Planned Parenthood with it looked like her older daughter in her late twenties or early thirties.  She stopped the car to say to us to "get a life".  "Oh yea", I said "we're trying to save the lives of these children that Planned Parenthood kills".  Off she went into the parking lot to park her car & let her daughter out.  Then she came out of the car with her white poodle on a leach.  "I called over to her to tell her that children are more important than dogs, & if she cared about animals then why can't she care about people too?  Here she comes walking over to the fence, where we stand to call out to the people, when they get out of their cars.  I always feel like I'm in jail, when they walk over to speak to us, at the fence.  Some come around the bushes to talk to us face to face, which is better for communication, though more dangerous for us.   She rattled on & on & was saying nothing.  Her poor dog probably thought she was crazy & was embraced to be with her.  See I told you that I wasn't blaming the dog.  I asked Martha to take over & again this poor lady ranted & raved about, well we don't know???  She went back to her car & stayed there until she took her dog for another walk about 20 minutes later.  The third walk, for the person that she dropped off was still in there, for what I don't know.  This time I was alone, it was about 4pm & Martha was in the center doing a pregnancy test & everyone else had gone.  She turned the corner where the bushes are & there she met me face to face.  I really don't think that she though that we were still out there & she wanted a longer walk for her dog.  Surprise!!  She snarled, not the dog but her, & quickly pointed at the graphic pictures of the aborted baby that was decapitated.  She said to me "you better be careful your condemning your soul, doing this" & she pointed to the graphic sign.  I said back to her "how can I be condemning my soul when I'm doing something good"?  "It's your soul I'm worried about".  Then I said "why are you not angry at the people in there that are doing this to the babies, pointing to the sign, but you're angry at us for showing you the truth"?  She snarled once again & walked away back to her car with her white poodle.  Only God will be able to get through her.  Martha was back outside with me now, it was about 4:20pm & the woman with the dog & her daughter were driving out of the Planned Parenthood parking lot.  The car stopped & the passenger rolled down the window & said "they do other things in there not just abortions, they give out birth control to teenagers".  "Really, birth control kills babies too, I said".  The mouth of the driver hung down & she started to mouth off again.  Didn't understand a single work she mumbled.  They drove off into the evening. They just didn't want to hear the Truth.  Lord please help these two women & bring them to your Truth.  Amen. 
 
The death escort with the very short hair was there doing her harm to those going into the abortion mill.  I went into the center to get a chair for Carmen, who is about 70 years old, who stands across the street holding the Our Lady of Guadeloupe sign.  As I was crossing the street the death escort was walking across the street to the other side too.  I met her across the street, it so happened.  I looked at her & my spirit cringed.  She had no affect, dead in the face with a cold fixed stare that only looked ahead.  I spoke to her with sternness but with kindness to what harm she is doing to the poor victims of Planned Parenthood.  No response ... "I see dead people"!  It's so sad being there on the front lines especially when people are non responsive.  We always said that we would rather have someone scream & holler at us, for they still have a conscious, rather than those who have no affect, for they probably lost theirs. 
 
A young woman drove by me for I was again all alone & threw something out of the car window.  I holler to her "love you".  You can bet that she probably had had an abortion in the past.  A little while later I saw some birds gathering at the site where she threw something out of her window.  At least it was food for the birds & she missed me. 
 
Two young girls were walking down the sidewalk & came right over to me .  The one girl said to me "I think that I'm pregnant & I want a pregnancy test".  I looked over at Martha & asked her if she would bring the girls to Focus for the test.  She said "yes" & they followed her into the pregnancy center.  I was again now by myself.  About 10 minutes later two young people were walking up the sidewalk heading for Planned Parenthood.  A guy & a girl.  He was listening to music.  I told them that they kill babies in Planned Parenthood & that I could help them.  I saw the girl smirk at the boyfriend, saying something.  Then all of a sudden a Mountain Dew bottle came flying over the bushes right at me.  You little snip, you could have hurt me.  They didn't care & it certainly showed their guilt.  I'm a sitting duck when I'm by myself, which I hope won't be to often. 
 
Martha was back & two girls were driving out of the parking lot of death & destruction.  The passenger appeared to look like  she was going to take the Truth packet that was being offered to her but she just had a sick smile on her young face & rolled down the window to throw her newly obtained condom at us.  One less for your boyfriend, who probably is using you anyhow, my dear! What the hey, they're 'free'.  How disrespectful to yourself.  You're not hurting us, oh maybe a little bit.  Our hearts do hurt when we see bad behavior. 
 
The wind was blowing the signs & us all over the place.  We went into the center around 5pm.  A couple of moms came in for children's clothes & some small items in the material aid room.  Around 6:15pm, Martha, John & I had a real nice supper together of chicken, potatoes & salad.  We all worked in the center for awhile until we left around 8:30pm.  It was a hard Tuesday for sure. 
 
 
Wednesday, November 24, 2010 in front Planned Parenthood

I got a call on my cell to ask when we were open.  I said that I was on my way from church downtown.  A middle aged Africian American man on a bike was waiting for me at the door to the center.  He got some diapers & clothes for his two children & a pair of pants for himself, his were torn & dirty.  He left very happy.

Sheila was standing with the sign Planned Parenthood Kills babies & 4 kids in the car stopped & hollered "kill the babies".  I was at the literature box & heard this & turned around to tell them to get away from us & to repent, as I walked towards the car.  Sicko's. 

A young boy, on a bike, stopped again to talk to us & received another Rosary to give to a friend.  He again stopped by later on & asked me what religion was I said I was a Catholic.

A woman, with her baby went into Planned Parenthood, & I was upset to see this.  She said something nasty & I asked her not to come back or to bring her baby for this was an evil place.  She pressed down on her horn & sped away I asked her to drive carefully for baby & for her sake & that we cared.  I had a good talk with Martha about mothers bringing their babies into Planned Parenthood.
 
An African American woman who works at Planned Parenthood was coming around the bushes with a container filled with envelopes.  She was going to the mailbox down the street.  I was standing by Buckpitt the business next to Planned Parenthood talking to Sheila for she was leaving.  I had just come out of Focus & was walking on the sidewalk to get to the front lines when I stopped to talk to Sheila.  I saw the worker at PP walking towards us.  I was holding the graphic sign & as she passed I told her that this is what Rachael Phelps does to babies inside Planned Parenthood where she works.  She looked at the sign & continued to walk to the mailbox.  I said "good bye" to Sheila & went to join Martha who was praying.  After a few minutes I looked down the sidewalk to see that Sheila was walking & talking to the woman form Planned Parenthood.  Good for you dear Sheila!!  Then Sheila left the woman & she was walking alone passed Martha & I.  I again showed her the picture & she mumbled something.  I didn't know how to interrupt it for I wasn't sure if it was a cold response or not.  I again said something to her & then said that she was all messed up.  She was now walking passed the bushes & into the parking lot & then turned around & walked back towards me.  She approached me to say that she also works for the Baden Street Project & that she woks in the Administrative part of Planned Parenthood.  Then she landed me a whopper & said that she was a 'Born Again' Christian.  I almost passed out or threw up.   I regained my composure & said to her that she really didn't know the Lord to be working in a place that killed His children & that she was really betraying Him & maybe didn't realize it.  She didn't say anything else & resumed her walk back to the killing center.  As she was still walking & said that we will pray for her & that there was still HOPE for her & she disappeared into the doors of the death mill.  My heart sank once more out there on the front lines of battle where you hear & see & know so many horrible & difficult scenarios.  It's ONLY through the grace of God that I'm out there at all to save lives & souls, through His power.  I am humbled by the experiences. 

David came & got the walker for his baby David Tobias.

Tucker came & went outside to pray & protest.  After Martha left I went outside to be with him & a car went into Planned Parenthood & all I said was that they kill babies in there & she went bonkers.  She screamed something at me & stayed in Planned Parenthood only a few minutes & came out screaming at me some more.  How sad. Another difficult day.  The hearts of men are growing colder & I must admit I was angry this last 2 days due to the apathy of killing children.
 
A guy, came around the bushes & said that he was going to donate $20 for each protester who was protesting in front of PP.  Martha & I told him that we were going to donate our prayers for him to repent & have his soul saved.  He went over to his car & went in.  Maybe he already had donated for he was leaving now.  When he pulled out of the driveway & said "your mother, your mother" he put his hand to his ear & had an expression on his face as if to say "what are you going to say about my mother"?  I then finished the sentence by saying "your mother was pro life, can you stand it, she gave birth to you".  He drove out of the parking lot & onto the street & went far far away. 
 
I was by myself for Martha was in the center with someone & a car stopped across the street & a man got out & walked across the street towards me.  "Oh no", I thought to myself, not another nutty person.  He came over to me & looked at me & handed me some papers & said "I have the answer, it'll be over soon".  Okay sir, thanks & you have a great day. I then looked at what he handed me to read, it said 'THE END OF THE WORLD WILL ON MAY 21, 2011'. IT was a Jehovah Witness newsletter.  Here we go again!  At least he was nice. 
  
Malaysia stopped with her baby & her grandmother to get some diapers & wipes & some other nice things.  We were busy putting clothes away. Martha had to go early so no supper tonight. 

Carole was still sick today but will come back next Tuesday & Wednesday. Yeah!
 
Have a wonderful Thanksgivng Day tomorrow!!!
We all have so much to thank God for!!  Enjoy your turkey day with family &/or friends or just being alone. 


 Tuesday, November 30, 2010 in front of Planned Parenthood

I was called by a young lady that wanted a pregnancy test for she had taken one at home & it was positive & she needed a note for her doctor.  I told her to come in today from 1-6pm.  She came at 1:30pm with her mother.  I repeated the test & it was positive so I wrote a note to her doctor stating this, so she could make an appointment at the General Hospital.  I gave her & her mother lots of information & we had a good talk.  Our newest client wants to come back to volunteer, in the Material Aid Room, which I said "yes", so we made it for this Thursday afternoon. Hope to see her then. 

Martha called earlier to tell me that after Mass today she would have to go pick up her friend from work & take her home, for her car had broken down.  She left right after noon Mass & got to the center around 1:45pm.  I was happy to see her back.  I had to go to a new moms home to bring her some diapers, baby wipes & some newborn baby clothes, for her new son.  She lives on Norton St., so it wasn't to far away.  I ate my sandwich during the red lights. Sandy had come to help out & I put her to work as soon as she got at the center, around 1pm.  She put things away & made Truth packets.  Great helper!! 
 
Donna, Carole, Martha & Ryan, the father & his son Ryan Jr. were also on the front lines.  It was so windy out there today that the sign that Carole was holding flung in the air & hit Donna right on the thumb.  It begun to swell up so she came into the center to put ice on it for 20 minutes & to recover.  She was upset by a comment that one of the pro lifers had made earlier but they both worked out their differences which is always good.  We are all under attack by the Evil One out there but God is in control & works it all out for good. 
Cleveland, our street friend, came walking down the street with his coat wide open, he looked to cold to describe.  He asked for food which we gave to him & told him to zip up his jacket to stay warm.  He's like a little kid. 
 
I was in & out of the center but know I was outside & it was raining, which I dislike the most.  To get wet with you all your clothes on is icky but we're out there anyhow for the Lord & for the mothers & their babies.  When I arrived where the team
were standing there was two gentlemen talking to them.  It was strange because we get people to stop to talk to us all the time but what was strange was that they had a camera with a long wire & a mouth piece attached to it.   I found out that it was Rick Castellano, who has a show on Channel 18 from 1to 1:30AM & his cameraman.  Check out: http://rickcastellano.com/index.php.  They wanted to do a interview in the rain for their show.  They are pro life & hate abortion too.  First they interviewed Ryan & then Martha.  I went on to just give our days & times that we are out there on the sidewalk & in the center & what we do there.  Rick told the cameraman that he was going to give Focus a donation & handed me a $100 bill, to which my mouth hung open & I said "thanks Rick".  Then he took pictures of all of us on the sidewalk with the pictures.  There was Martha, Carole, Ryan & Ryan & myself, Donna had left earlier.  So we'll see if we get on the air on his show.  They said "good bye" & walked to finish the segment under the Planned Parenthood sign to which the Death Escort, Barry Swan came out & chased them off of the property.  I wonder if Barry will get on TV too!!  They settled in on the sidewalk in front of Planned Parenthood to finish the Rochester story.  They got into their van & then comes out Barry Swan & Eric, the supervisor,at Planned Parenthood.  They just stood there looking up the street like two bumps on the log.  You Tattle Tattler, Barry Swan you!  Off, the white van goes onto the street, & the two wet heads went back into the death mill, Planned Parenthood.  Us pro lifers talked about what happened for a short time afterwards but we needed to get focused once again to try to witness & help people at our little corner of the world. 
 
Martha went in to help a young woman to get some baby clothes for her infant & some other nice things too.  She also gave a couple of pregnancy tests & they were both negative, to which she spoke about abstinence to the girls.  They were receptive & listened & were grateful that somebody cared about them. 
 
I had made meatloaf with mashed potatoes & a salad.  Martha, I & Dan, for he stopped by to say hello & to have supper with us, had a nice dinner together.  I put him to work, in the center, after I fed him first.  Aren't I nice  :)  We had a busy day at Focus in & out on the street.  Onto tomorrow!!
 
 
Wednesday, December 1, 2010 in front of Planned Parenthood

Earlier this morning, I got a call from my landlord, asking for me to come to the center earlier to open up the rooms for the workers to put in the new lights.  I told him that I would get there around 11:45am to open up the doors, he said that would be fine.  So I did.  I met Cory, who was one of the workers, it's his father's business.  He & his partner were so nice.  They told me that there was a real problem with the roof & it's leaking.  I told him that I already knew this & what a mess it can be. I told them that the landlord can't afford to fix the roof because it would cost him so much money, so we just have to deal with the leaks as they come.  He looked like he felt for our situation.  Some blessed girl will get a great husband in Cory.  The new lights that they put in are brighter & more energy efficient, so this will save our landlord some money, maybe for the new roof in 10 years!!!  
 
Paula & her daughter Hannah & her four other children, were planning to come to the center to help out, after the noon Mass downtown.  We were just blessed with two high chairs & Paula put the twins, who she adopted from Ethiopia when there were 6 months old, into the chairs for their lunch.  The other two kids joined them at the table while the other son was studying in the Great Room & Paula & Hannah helped me in the office.  The weather was getting bad, for the rain was now coning down as wet snow, the start of winter.  Carole said yesterday that if the weather was going to be bad then she wasn't going to come, which she didn't. :(  So it was Martha & I out on the front lines today.  I got a call on my cell phone & it was one of the pregnancy centers telling me that one of their clients had told them that she was planning to go for an abortion at Planned Parenthood tomorrow, Thursday, which is the day that they kill babies all day there.  She asked me to keep my eyes open for a tall young girl with dark hair & she would be the passenger, for she doesn't drive.  I told her that I would go out there early tomorrow.  I told her that we, sidewalk counselors, call out to all the people driving into the parking lot & offer them help.  She was grateful to hear this.  We hung up & I decided to go out there early tomorrow for her & for all the moms that were about to have their child be murdered, by the abortionist Rachael Phelps, at Planned Parenthood.  What a horrible place to be at but so necessay to be there to 'save' & 'change' lives, through the grace of God. 
 
 
Thursday,  December 2, 2010 in front of Planned Parenthood
 
You just can't imagine the feeling it is to get up & get dressed & go to a place where they are killing people, one right after another, & you can't do a thing about it, you just are there.  Yes, you're calling out & offering them help & begging them not to do this to their precious baby & themselves but most of them don't listen & go right into Planned Parenthood & do the ghastly deed against humanity.  You pray & call out & wait & hope that they heard your message of life & changed their minds & come out & go home with their baby still in her womb.  But that's not usually the case most, if not all, have their baby killed by Rachael Phelps, on Thursdays at Planned Parenthood.  I arrived by myself on the front lines at 8:45am & brought out one graphic sign & the literature box & the mega phone.  I called out to the people going into this place of death & destruction but no one responded. 
 
I called out to a young girl going in & when she came back out & I called her over to speak to me, which she did.  I told her that we gave out 'free' pregnancy tests at Focus right next to this yellow building & I pointed to the building.  I then gave her a Truth packet & a rubberized 12 week old baby in the plastic bag with the growth & development chart.  She said that PP wouldn't do a pregnancy test today. She said that she was going to come to Focus today after school at 3:30pm for a test but that she was 16 years old & she's not ready for a baby, if she is pregnant. Funny she's ready for sex but not for a baby, which the two go hand in hand, remember that's how we all got here.  I said that the baby is ready for you & abortion is the "taking of a life & only God can give life & take life".  I could tell that she really didn't want to hear that part of my message to her.  What's wrong with females that they are killing their young???  There's nothing's wrong now -a -days, there's no talk about right or wrong or SIN, it's just what will make you happy or solve your problems, which abortion doesn't at all but it creates problems that you will wish you never had.  That's the lie & deception of abortion & Planned Parenthood, who sells you the abortion & you buy the worst lie imaginable.  She left & she didn't keep her appointment at 3:30 that day for the pregnancy test.  I only hope & pray that's she's not pregnant & that the Truth packet will speak to her too.  Poor girl!
 
Then a young woman walked by me to go into Planned Parenthood.  I called to her to let her know what they do in there.  She came out about 10 minutes later & I talked to her again.  I asked if she had any children & she said that she did so I invited her to come to Focus & shop for 'free' in the Material Aid Room.  Just then Pat & Bill came to pray so I left them on the sidewalk to pray & her & I went into the center to get her children something's.  She said that she was here to get her records for General for she's going over there now.  I said "great" & lead her into the room, she was impressed.  About 5 minutes later one of our regular clients came in with her baby & her sister.  Her son was 8 months old today... Happy Birthday, little one!!  I told her that she caught me by chance because I'm not usually there on Thursday mornings but in the afternoons.  "Why didn't you call me first" I asked.  She said that her phone bill was $600 & has to use now the dollar a day plan.  No phone no communication.  She was glad that I was there & that she could get more diapers & wipes & clothes for little Leko, who was asleep. 
 
After the moms left I went back outside to be on the front lines again by myself for Pat & Bill were now leaving after they prayed the Rosary & the Divine Mercy prayer.  I asked them if they could change from Tuesday mornings to Thursdays from 9:30 to 10:30am & they said that they would.  I want coverage all day on Thursdays when they're killing these precious children that God had just created.  Sheila will join them at that time & I will come around 11am & then Martha will come around 1pm to be with me for the afternoon.  Hope that this will workout to cover most of the day in prayer & protest & counseling.  Hope that more lives will be saved, by the grace of God this way.  I wish that there was more people that's for sure.  Where are you all???  We need you!!
 
 
Thursday,  December 2, 2010 in front of Planned Parenthood

You just can't imagine the feeling it is to get up & get dressed & go to a place where they are killing people, one right after another, & you can't do a thing about it, you just are there.  Yes, you're calling out & offering them help & begging them not to do this to their precious baby & themselves but most of them don't listen & go right into Planned Parenthood & do the ghastly deed against humanity.  You pray & call out & wait & hope that they heard your message of life & changed their minds & come out & go home with their baby still in her womb.  But that's not usually the case most, if not all, have their baby killed by Rachael Phelps, on Thursdays at Planned Parenthood.  I arrived by myself on the front lines at 8:45am & brought out one graphic sign & the literature box & the mega phone.  I called out to the people going into this place of death & destruction but no one responded.

 I called out to a young girl going in & when she came back out & I called her over to speak to me, which she did.  I told her that we gave out 'free' pregnancy tests at Focus right next to this yellow building & I pointed to the building.  I then gave her a Truth packet & a rubberized 12 week old aby in the plastic bag with the growth & development chart.  She said that PP wouldn't do a pregnancy test today. She said that she was going to come to Focus today after school at 3:30pm for a test but that she was 16 years old & she's not ready for a baby, if she is pregnant. Funny she's ready for sex but not for a baby, which the two go hand in hand, remember that's how we all got here.  I said that the baby is ready for you & abortion is the "taking of a life & only God can give life & take life".  I could tell that she really didn't want to hear that part of my message to her.  What's wrong with females that they are killing their young???  There's nothing's wrong now -a -days, there's no talk about right or wrong or SIN, it's just what will make you happy or solve your problems, which abortion doesn't at all but it creates problems that you will wish you never had.  That's the lie & deception of abortion & Planned Parenthood, who sells you the abortion & you buy the worst lie imaginable.  She left & she didn't keep her appointment at 3:30 that day for the pregnancy test.  I only hope & pray that's she's not pregnant & that the Truth packet will speak to her too.  Poor girl!

Then a young woman walked by me to go into Planned Parenthood.  I called to her to let her know what they do in there.  She came out about 10 minutes later & I talked to her again.  I asked if she had any children & she said that she did so I invited her to come to Focus & shop for 'free' in the
Material Aid Room.  Just then Pat & Bill came to pray so I left them on the sidewalk to pray & her & I went into the center to get her children something's.  She said that she was here to get her records for General for she's going over there now.  I said "great" & lead her into the room, she was impressed.  About 5 minutes later one of our regular clients came in with her baby & her sister.  Her son was 8 months old today... Happy Birthday, little one!!  I told her that she caught me by chance because I'm not usually there on Thursday mornings but in the afternoons.  "Why didn't you call me first" I asked.  She said that her phone bill was $600 & has to use now the dollar a day plan.  No phone no communication.  She was glad that I was there & that she could get more diapers & wipes & clothes for little Leko, who was asleep.

After the moms left I went back outside to be on the front lines again by myself for Pat & Bill were now leaving after they prayed the Rosary & the Divine Mercy prayer.  I asked them if they could change from Tuesday mornings to Thursdays form 9:30 to 10:30am & they said that they would.  I want coverage all day on Thursdays when they're killing these precious children that God had just created.  Sheila will join them at that time & I will come around 11am & then Martha will come around 1pm to be with me for the afternoon.  Hope that this will workout to cover most of the day in prayer & protest & counseling.  Hope that more lives will be saved, by the grace of God this way.  I wish that there was more people that's for sure. Where are you all??? We need you!!
 
It was now in the afternoon & Bill was settled across the street, sitting on his chair, with his sign of the precious aborted baby Malachi.  Just then by the corner of my eye I saw the Liberty Construction truck drive by Bill & her gave him the 'bird'.  This makes me angry, that he showed such disrespect to Bill & the aborted baby.  I saw that he had stopped his truck, down the street, so I walked down the street to confront him.  I approached him & asked him if he gave the gentleman who was holding the sign across the street from Planned Parenthood the 'bird'.  He appeared nervous at first then was nasty & combative.  He said that he had five fingers, oh really.  I said it was the middle finger & that's bad.  He said to me in a nasty tone of voice "you people make me sick", "they give out pills to". I said that the pills act as an abortificant & that kills babies earlier on.  He responded in an angry tone of voice that I was crazy.   I was in no mood for him, that's for sure.  I asked him if he had paid for an abortion & he replied with something that I can't repeat on my web site.  I said that I was going to report him & he said "go ahead, my name is Bob.  I said thank you & I just want you to know that you gave the 'bird' to a Korean War Vet, you crazy person.  Off I walked down to my post on the front lines.  When I got back I reached into the literature box to get a pen & paper & I walked back to the Liberty Construction truck & took down the license number & the number on the truck & put down the date & time of the incident.  (I did call on Friday & reported him & the secretary told me that she would pass my complaint onto the Supervisor) I feel strongly that when you are working for a company & are on their time & get paid by them you should keep your big mouth closed.  You represent the company that you work for, so be nice!! 
 
Mary S. has now just arrived for Martha hadn't arrived yet.  Just then a man drove by me & gave me the 'bird' & then he drove into Buckpitt, which is the business right next door to Planned Parenthood, they do nothing & have been a thorn in my side for as long as I can remember. We are in front of Buckpitt more than Planned Parenthood because of the Buffer Zone which places us more near them, which they hate.  What's this about the 'bird' today!!  When he got out of the car & I hollered over to him saying "did you just give me the bird"?  He just had a smirk on his face & walked into Buckpitt with his briefcase.  About 10 minutes later he came out & went into his red SUV & drove out of Buckpitt.  As he passed me I said to him "Lord have Mercy on you", just then he took both hands off of the wheel & made a crazy looking face to Bill.  I was so scared that he would run into him for he was sitting on the sidewalk so near the street.  As the SUV passed by I saw that Bill was alive & I hollered something to the crazy man.  He was nuts.  Oh thank you Lord that that man didn't lose control of his car & killed Bill.  He probably was involved in an abortion.  This is usually the case that drives these people to the extreme, out on the front lines.  How dangerous they are & how sad it is to see them that way too.  Later when the boss of Buckpitt was walking up the street with one of his employees & said to him that one of his sales people gave me the 'bird'.  The first thing that he said to me was "what did you say to him"?  Typical for this man of no brains or heart.  I answered back to him that he almost ran into Bill.  "Whose Bill", he asked.  I said the older man across the street, the Korean War Vet".  He said "then why don't you make out a report".  "Oh yea", I said, "I have no license number for the police, or description for them either," you jack wagon.  I didn't say 'jack wagon', I just thought it.  I walked away from this poor soul.  I said to Mary S. " imagine him saying to me "what did you say to him first, he's always blaming us pro lifers for everything".  She was upset with him too.  What a wimp of a man. 
 
Martha a has now just arrived.  She over slept, which is fine with me.  She was so tired & I do understand that, that's for sure.  Mary S. & Bill had to leave so it was Martha & I now out on the front lines.  I was so glad that Suzanne, our Thursday counselor had just arrives too.   I went into the center to talk to her for a few minutes giving her an update & then the doorbell rang & it was one of our clients that just had her baby about 4 months ago.  I greeted her with a hug & she told me that she needed our help once more.  Suzanne took her & her friend, who was 6 months pregnant, into the Rose Room to counsel them.  After that they went into the Material Aid Room to get some things for their babies.  I was so happy to see her.  Her phone was disconnected so I couldn't get a hold of her, which always frustrates me, but I just wait for my girls to come to the center when they can get there.  
 
I was now with Martha, on the front lines, & while I was away in the center she told me that she received many 'birds',  What's with people today??  Also that someone came into Buckpitt & said something nasty to her.  She said the Hail Mary prayer & he didn't say another word to her.  Thanks Mother Mary.  I looked over the fence & I saw a young girl just getting into the car with her boyfriend, who I had spoken to twice, as he smoked his cigarettes in front of Planned Parenthood.  I asked him to save his baby if his girlfriend was in there aborting this precious child, your son or daughter.  When I saw her I said to her "I hope that you didn't kill your baby".  She instantly gave me the 'bird' & said a few choice words, to which I didn't respond back to her, except to say "repent for the sin of murder".  As they drove out of the parking lot she saw Bill across the street with the graphic sign & she gave him the 'bird' too & they drove off up the street.  How do I comprehend this??  A mother & father, paying the serial killer, to kill their own child, at Planned Parenthood.  It's soooo difficult for me.   I just have to give it to God right away & then cry later & beat my breasts, for the pain is so intense.  Why is this happening??
 
As I was trying to settle down two men were walking up the sidewalk.  I offered them a Rosary & they said that they would like one.  So I gave them each a Rosary.  The one guy, with the long gray hair & the pierce earrings, said that he was once a Catholic & Martha told him to come on back to the Catholic Church.  She told him about Our Lady of Victory Church downtown on Pleasant St. & when the Confessions were for him to go & then he could go to Holy Communion after that.  I told him about what the peace sign represents which is an inverted cross, as an insult to the Lord.  "The crazy 60's",  I said to him, "it's time to move on".  He was nice & receptive to both Martha & I.  Then he told us then when he was 17 he & his girlfriend had sex & she became pregnant & had an abortion.  He said that he didn't want her to have one but she went ahead & did it.  It crushed him.  I think to this very day he's affected by the lose of his child.  I went into the center to get a couple of brochures that would hopefully help hi with phone number to call to talk to someone that could help ease his pain, he was grateful for the help & thanked both Martha & I for a 'new beginning.  We were happy to do it, that's for
Thursday,  December 2, 2010 in front of Planned Parenthood

You just can't imagine the feeling it is to get up & get dressed & go to a place where they are killing people, one right after another, & you can't do a thing about it, you just are there.  Yes, you're calling out & offering them help & begging them not to do this to their precious baby & themselves but most of them don't listen & go right into Planned Parenthood & do the ghastly deed against humanity.  You pray & call out & wait & hope that they heard your message of life & changed their minds & come out & go home with their baby still in her womb.  But that's not usually the case most, if not all, have their baby killed by Rachael Phelps, on Thursdays at Planned Parenthood.  I arrived by myself on the front lines at 8:45am & brought out one graphic sign & the literature box & the mega phone.  I called out to the people going into this place of death & destruction but no one responded.

 I called out to a young girl going in & when she came back out & I called her over to speak to me, which she did.  I told her that we gave out 'free' pregnancy tests at Focus right next to this yellow building & I pointed to the building.  I then gave her a Truth packet & a rubberized 12 week old baby in the plastic bag with the growth & development chart.  She said that PP wouldn't do a pregnancy test today. She said that she was going to come to Focus today after school at 3:30pm for a test but that she was 16 years old & she's not ready for a baby, if she is pregnant. Funny she's ready for sex but not for a baby, which the two go hand in hand, remember that's how we all got here.  I said that the baby is ready for you & abortion is the "taking of a life & only God can give life & take life".  I could tell that she really didn't want to hear that part of my message to her.  What's wrong with females that they are killing their young???  There's nothing's wrong now -a -days, there's no talk about right or wrong or SIN, it's just what will make you happy or solve your problems, which abortion doesn't at all but it creates problems that you will wish you never had.  That's the lie & deception of abortion & Planned Parenthood, who sells you the abortion & you buy the worst lie imaginable.  She left & she didn't keep her appointment at 3:30 that day for the pregnancy test.  I only hope & pray that's she's not pregnant & that the Truth packet will speak to her too.  Poor girl!

Then a young woman walked by me to go into Planned Parenthood.  I called to her to let her know what they do in there.  She came out about 10 minutes later & I talked to her again.  I asked if she had any children & she said that she did so I invited her to come to Focus & shop for 'free' in the
Material Aid Room.  Just then Pat & Bill came to pray so I left them on the sidewalk to pray & her & I went into the center to get her children something's.  She said that she was here to get her records for General for she's going over there now.  I said "great" & lead her into the room, she was impressed.  About 5 minutes later one of our regular clients came in with her baby & her sister.  Her son was 8 months old today... Happy Birthday, little one!!  I told her that she caught me by chance because I'm not usually there on Thursday mornings but in the afternoons.  "Why didn't you call me first" I asked.  She said that her phone bill was $600 & has to use now the dollar a day plan.  No phone no communication.  She was glad that I was there & that she could get more diapers & wipes & clothes for little Leko, who was asleep.

After the moms left I went back outside to be on the front lines again by myself for Pat & Bill were now leaving after they prayed the Rosary & the Divine Mercy prayer.  I asked them if they could change from Tuesday mornings to Thursdays form 9:30 to 10:30am & they said that they would.  I want coverage all day on Thursdays when they're killing these precious children that God had just created.  Sheila will join them at that time & I will come around 11am & then Martha will come around 1pm to be with me for the afternoon.  Hope that this will workout to cover most of the day in prayer & protest & counseling.  Hope that more lives will be saved, by the grace of God this way.  I wish that there was more people that's for sure. Where are you all??? We need you!!
 
It was now in the afternoon & Bill was settled across the street, sitting on his chair, with his sign of the precious aborted baby Malachi.  Just then by the corner of my eye I saw the Liberty Construction truck drive by Bill & her gave him the 'bird'.  This makes me angry, that he showed such disrespect to Bill & the aborted baby.  I saw that he had stopped his truck, down the street, so I walked down the street to confront him.  I approached him & asked him if he gave the gentleman who was holding the sign across the street from Planned Parenthood the 'bird'.  He appeared nervous at first then was nasty & combative.  He said that he had five fingers, oh really.  I said it was the middle finger & that's bad.  He said to me in a nasty tone of voice "you people make me sick", "they give out pills to". I said that the pills act as an abortificant & that kills babies earlier on.  He responded in an angry tone of voice that I was crazy.   I was in no mood for him, that's for sure.  I asked him if he had paid for an abortion & he replied with something that I can't repeat on my web site.  I said that I was going to report him & he said "go ahead, my name is Bob.  I said thank you & I just want you to know that you gave the 'bird' to a Korean War Vet, you crazy person.  Off I walked down to my post on the front lines.  When I got back I reached into the literature box to get a pen & paper & I walked back to the Liberty Construction truck & took down the license number & the number on the truck & put down the date & time of the incident.  ( I did call on Friday & reported him & the secretary told me that she would pass my complaint onto the Supervisor).  I feel strongly that when you are working for a company & are on their time & get paid by them you should keep your big mouth closed.  You represent the company that you work for, so be nice!! 
 
Mary S. has now just arrived for Martha hadn't arrived yet.  Just then a man drove by me & gave me the 'bird' & then he drove into Buckpitt, which is the business right next door to Planned Parenthood, they do nothing & have been a thorn in my side for as long as I can remember. We are in front of Buckpitt more than Planned Parenthood because of the Buffer Zone which places us more near them, which they hate.  What's this about the 'bird' today!!  When he got out of the car & I hollered over to him saying "did you just give me the bird"?  He just had a smirk on his face & walked into Buckpitt with his briefcase.  About 10 minutes later he came out & went into his red SUV & drove out of Buckpitt.  As he passed me I said to him "Lord have Mercy on you", just then he took both hands off of the wheel & made a crazy looking face to Bill.  I was so scared that he would run into him for he was sitting on the sidewalk so near the street.  As the SUV passed by I saw that Bill was alive & I hollered something to the crazy man.  He was nuts.  Oh thank you Lord that that man didn't lose control of his car & killed Bill.  He probably was involved in an abortion.  This is usually the case that drives these people to the extreme, out on the front lines.  How dangerous they are & how sad it is to see them that way too.  Later when the boss of Buckpitt was walking up the street with one of his employees & said to him that one of his sales people gave me the 'bird'.  The first thing that he said to me was "what did you say to him"?  Typical for this man of no brains or heart.  I answered back to him that he almost ran into Bill.  "Whose Bill", he asked.  I said the older man across the street, the Korean War Vet".  He said "then why don't you make out a report".  "Oh yea", I said, "I have no license number for the police, or description for them either," you jack wagon.  I didn't say 'jack wagon', I just thought it.  I walked away from this poor soul.  I said to Mary S. " imagine him saying to me "what did you say to him first, he's always blaming us pro lifers for everything".  She was upset with him too.  What a wimp of a man. 
 
Martha a has now just arrived.  She over slept, which is fine with me.  She was so tired & I do understand that, that's for sure.  Mary S. & Bill had to leave so it was Martha & I now out on the front lines.  I was so glad that Suzanne, our Thursday counselor had just arrives too.   I went into the center to talk to her for a few minutes giving her an update & then the doorbell rang & it was one of our clients that just had her baby about 4 months ago.  I greeted her with a hug & she told me that she needed our help once more.  Suzanne took her & her friend, who was 6 months pregnant, into the Rose Room to counsel them.  After that they went into the Material Aid Room to get some things for their babies.  I was so happy to see her.  Her phone was disconnected so I couldn't get a hold of her, which always frustrates me, but I just wait for my girls to come to the center when they can get there.  It's a happy time. 
 
I was now with Martha, on the front lines, & while I was away in the center she told me that she received many 'birds',  What's with people today??  Also that someone came into Buckpitt & said something nasty to her.  She said the Hail Mary prayer & he didn't say another word to her.  Thanks Mother Mary.
